  4237                                  		; 14/12/2023
  4238 000016D5 41                      		inc	cx	; cl >= 2
  4239                                  
  4240                                  ; 16/10/2022
  4241                                  ; MSDOS 3.3 - "MSEQU.INC" (24/07/1987)
  4242                                  INITSPOT EQU	534h	; IBM wants 4 zeros here
  4243                                  BRKADR	 EQU	1BH * 4	; 6CH, 1BH break vector address
  4244                                  TIMADR	EQU	1CH * 4	; 70H, 1CH timer interrupt
  4245                                  DSKADR	EQU	1EH * 4	; address of ptr to disk parameters
  4246                                  SEC9	EQU	522h	; address of disk parameters
  4247                                  CHROUT	EQU	29h
  4248                                  LSTDRV	EQU     504h
  4249                                  
  4250                                  ; determine whether we booted from floppy or hard disk...
  4251                                  
  4252                                  		; 20/12/2022
  4253 000016D6 88C8                    		mov	al, cl	; 26/05/2019
  4254                                  
  4255 000016D8 F6C280                  		test	dl, 80h		; boot from floppy ?
  4256 000016DB 7502                    		jnz	short gothrd	; no.
  4257 000016DD 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; indicate boot	from drive a
  4258                                  gothrd:					
  4259                                  
  4260                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
  4261                                  ;   ax = 0-based drive we booted from
  4262                                  ;   bios_l, bios_h set.
  4263                                  ;   cl = number of floppies including fake one
  4264                                  ;   ch = media byte
  4265

  4276

  4278

  4281                                  					; bios_l, bios_h set.
  4282                                  					; cl = number of floppies including fake one
  4283                                  					; ch = media byte
  4284                                  		; 20/12/2022

  4296

  4298 000016E4 50                      		push	ax ; (**)	; save boot drive number and media byte
  4299                                  		
  4300                                  ; let model_byte, secondary_model_byte be set here!!!
  4301                                  
  4302 000016E5 B4C0                    		mov	ah, 0C0h
  4303 000016E7 CD15                    		int	15h	; SYSTEM - GET CONFIGURATION (XT after 1/10/86,AT mdl 3x9,CONV,XT286,PS)
  4304 000016E9 7215                    		jb	short no_rom_system_conf ; just	use Model_Byte
  4305 000016EB 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0
  4306 000016EE 7510                    		jnz	short no_rom_system_conf
  4307                                  
  4308                                  ;		; 20/12/2022
  4309                                  ;		; (Programmer's Guide to the AMIBIOS, page 268)
  4310                                  ;		; (https://stanislavs.org/helppc/int_15-c0.html)
  4311                                  ;
  4312                                  ;		INT 15h, ah = C0h - Return System Configuration Parameters (PS/2 only)
  4313                                  ;
  4314                                  ;		on return:
  4315                                  ;		CF = 0 if successful
  4316                                  ;		   = 1 if error
  4317                                  ;		AH = when CF set, 80h for PC & PCjr, 86h for XT
  4318                                  ;	     	    (BIOS after 11/8/82) and AT (BIOS after 1/10/84)
  4319                                  ;
  4320                                  ;		ES:BX = pointer to system descriptor table in ROM of the format:
  4321                                  ;
  4322                                  ;		Offset Size	     Description
  4323                                  ;
  4324                                  ;		  00   word   length of descriptor (8 minimum)
  4325                                  ;		  02   byte   model byte (same as F000:FFFE, not reliable)
  4326                                  ;		  03   byte   secondary model byte
  4327                                  ;		  04   byte   BIOS revision level (zero based)
  4328                                  ;		  05   byte   feature information, see below
  4329                                  ;		  06   dword  reserved
  4330                                  
  4331                                  		; 20/12/2022
  4332                                  		; ds = cs
  4333 000016F0 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+ROMBIOS_DESC.bios_sd_modelbyte]
  4334 000016F4 A2[3606]                		mov	[model_byte], al
  4335                                  		;mov	[cs:model_byte], al
  4336                                  					; get/save model byte
  4337 000016F7 268A4703                		mov	al, [es:bx+3]	; [es:bx+ROMBIOS_DESC.bios_sd_scnd_modelbyte]
  4338 000016FB A2[3706]                		mov	[secondary_model_byte], al
  4339                                  		;mov	[cs:secondary_model_byte], al
  4340                                  					; get/save secondary model byte
  4341 000016FE EB0C                    		jmp	short turn_timer_on
  4342                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4343                                  
  4344                                  no_rom_system_conf:			
  4345 00001700 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh
  4346 00001703 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
  4347                                  		; 20/12/2022
  4348 00001705 26A00E00                		mov	al, [es:0Eh]	; get model byte (from 0FFFFh:0Eh)
  4349 00001709 A2[3606]                		mov	[model_byte], al
  4350                                  		;mov	[cs:model_byte], al ; save model byte
  4351                                  turn_timer_on:				
  4352 0000170C B020                    		mov	al, 20h	; ' '   ; turn on the timer
  4353 0000170E E620                    		out	20h, al		; Interrupt controller,	8259A.
  4354                                  					; AKPORT
  4355                                  
  4356                                  ; some olivetti m24 machines have an 8530 serial communications
  4357                                  ; chip installed at io address 50h and 52h. if we're running
  4358                                  ; on one of those, we must inhibit the normal aux port initialization
  4359                                  
  4360                                  		; 20/12/2022
  4361                                  		; ds = cs
  4362 00001710 803E[3606]00            		cmp	byte [model_byte], 0
  4363                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0 ; next to last	byte in	rom bios
  4364 00001715 7510                    		jnz	short not_olivetti_m24 ; skip for all other machines
  4365                                  					; (except olivetti m24)
  4366 00001717 E466                    		in	al, 66h		; is 8530 installed?
  4367 00001719 A820                    		test	al, 20h
  4368 0000171B 740A                    		jz	short not_olivetti_m24 ; we're done if not
  4369 0000171D B00F                    		mov	al, 0Fh		; double check
  4370 0000171F E650                    		out	50h, al
  4371 00001721 E450                    		in	al, 50h
  4372 00001723 A801                    		test	al, 1		; this test was	copied from olivetti
  4373 00001725 7414                    		jz	short skip_aux_port_init ; take	this branch if 8530 installed
  4374                                  
  4375                                  not_olivetti_m24:
  4376 00001727 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; init com4
  4377 00001729 E84E08                  		call	aux_init
  4378 0000172C B002                    		mov	al, 2		; init com3
  4379 0000172E E84908                  		call	aux_init
  4380 00001731 B001                    		mov	al, 1		; init com2
  4381 00001733 E84408                  		call	aux_init
  4382 00001736 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; init com1
  4383 00001738 E83F08                  		call	aux_init
  4384                                  
  4385                                  skip_aux_port_init:			
  4386 0000173B B002                    		mov	al, 2		; init lpt3
  4387 0000173D E83208                  		call	print_init
  4388 00001740 B001                    		mov	al, 1		; init lpt2
  4389 00001742 E82D08                  		call	print_init
  4390 00001745 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; init lpt1

  4437                                  ;		50:00	byte	Print screen status byte

  4445                                  ;		50:10	word	BASICs default DS value (DEF SEG)
  4446                                  ;		50:12	dword	Pointer to BASIC INT 1C interrupt handler
  4447                                  ;		50:16	dword	Pointer to BASIC INT 23 interrupt handler
  4448                                  ;		50:1A	dword	Pointer to BASIC INT 24 disk error handler
  4449                                  ;		50:20	word	DOS dynamic storage
  4450                                  ;		50:22  14bytes	DOS diskette initialization table (INT 1E)
  4451                                  ;		50:30	4bytes	MODE command
  4452                                  ;		70:00		I/O drivers from IO.SYS/IBMBIO.COM

  4743                                  ; scan the list of drives to determine their type. we have three flavors of
  4744                                  ; diskette drives:
  4745                                  ;
  4746                                  ;   48tpi drives    we do nothing special for them
  4747                                  ;   96tpi drives    mark the fact that they have changeline support.
  4748                                  ;   3.5"  drives    mark changeline support and small.
  4749                                  ;
  4750                                  ; the following code uses registers for certain values:
  4751                                  ;
  4752                                  ;   dl - physical drive
  4753                                  ;   ds:di - points to current bds
  4754                                  ;   cx - flag bits for bds
  4755                                  ;   dh - form factor for the drive (1 - 48tpi, 2 - 96tpi, 3 - 3.5" medium)
  4756                                  					
  4757 00001877 30D2                    		xor	dl, dl
  4758

  4766 0000187E BF[1901]                		mov	di, start_bds 	; if we	are faking floppy drives we need
  4767                                  					; to set aside two bdss	for the	two fake floppy	drives
  4768                                  
  4769                                  ; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  4770                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.0, MSINIT.ASM)
  4771                                  
  4772                                  ; check to see if we are faking floppy drives. if not we don't
  4773                                  ; do anything special. if we are faking floppy drives we need
  4774                                  ; to set aside two bdss for the two fake floppy drives. we
  4775                                  ; don't need to initalise any fields though. so starting at start_bds
  4776                                  ; use the link field in the bds structure to go to the second bds
  4777                                  ; in the list and initalise it's link field to -1 to set the end of
  4778                                  ; the list. then jump to the routine at dohard to allocate/initialise
  4779                                  ; the bds for harddrives.
  4780                                  
  4781 00001881 803E[8D15]01            		cmp	byte [fakefloppydrv], 1
  4782 00001886 750B                    		jnz	short loop_drive
  4783 00001888 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  4784                                  					; di <-	first bds link
  4785 0000188A 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  4786                                  					; di <-	second bds link
  4787 0000188C C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; -1 ; set end of link
  4788 00001890 E90801                  		jmp	dohard		; allocate/initialise bds for harddrives

  4820                                  					; DL = drive number
  4821                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  4822                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives

  4824                                  		; 14/12/2023

  4827                                  		; 14/12/2023

  4829 000018B0 E98000                  		jmp	noparmsfromrom
  4830                                  
  4831                                  ; if cmos is bad, it gives es,ax,bx,cx,dh,di=0. cy=0.
  4832                                  ; in this case, we are going to put bogus informations to bds table.
  4833                                  ; we are going to set ch=39,cl=9,dh=1 to avoid divide overflow when
  4834                                  ; they are calculated at the later time. this is just for the diagnostic
  4835                                  ; diskette which need msbio,msdos to boot up before it sets cmos.
  4836                                  ; this should only happen with drive b.
  4837                                  
  4838                                  chk_pfr:
  4839 000018B3 80FD00                  		cmp	ch, 0		; if ch=0, then	cl,dh=0	too.
  4840 000018B6 7505                    		jnz	short pfr_ok
  4841                                  
  4842                                  		;mov	ch, 39		; rom gave wrong info.
  4843                                  		;mov	cl, 9		; let's default to 360k.

  4855

  4857

  4859                                  		;jbe	short eot_ok
  4860                                  		; 09/12/2022

  4864 000018D6 880E[2C01]              		mov	[eot], cl

  4867

  4881                                  ; Check	for presence of	changeline
  4882

  4884                                  		; (MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS has a bug here,
  4885                                  		;  it does not save CX,DX registers before INT 13h func 15h)
  4886                                  		; (this is also a ROMBIOS bug, some ROMBIOSs return number
  4887                                  		;  of sectors in cx:dx pair while others restore cx:dx)
  4888                                  		;  -- ref: Ralf Brown's Interrupt List --
  4889                                  		; ((MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:1AF0h))
  4890                                  		; ((PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2119h))

  4899                                  		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4900                                  					; DL = drive ID
  4901                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	disk type (3 = hard drive)
  4902                                  					; CX:DX	= number of sectors on the media
  4903                                  		; 12/12/2023

  4909                                  
  4910                                  		cmp	ah, 2		; check	for presence of	changeline

  4918                                  %endif

  4924                                  ; and can recognise. for the rest, we set the form factor as "other".

  4927

  4946 000018F8 803E[8B15]24            		cmp	byte [sec_trk], 36 ; is it ?
  4947 000018FD 744B                    		jz	short nextdrive	; yeah,	go update

  5091                                  					; set this true	for all	drives

  5093                                  
  5094                                  ; we need to do special things if we have a single drive system and are setting
  5095                                  ; up a logical drive. it needs to have the same int13 drive number as its
  5096                                  ; counterpart, but the next drive letter. also reset ownership flag.
  5097                                  ; we detect the presence of this situation by examining the flag single for the
  5098                                  ; value 2.
  5099 0000194F 803E[7800]02            		cmp	byte [single], 2
  5100 00001954 7505                    		jnz	short not_special
  5101 00001956 FECF                    		dec	bh		; int13	drive number same for logical drive
  5102 00001958 80F120                  		xor	cl, 20h	; fi_own_physical
  5103                                  					; reset	ownership flag for logical drive
  5104                                  not_special:
  5105                                  
  5106                                  ; the values that we put in for BDS_RBPB.BPB_HEADS and
  5107                                  ; BDS_RBPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK will only remain if the
  5108                                  ; form factor is of type "ffother".
  5109                                  				
  5110 0000195B 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; fill BDS for drive
  5111 0000195D A0[8A15]                		mov	al, [num_heads]

  5113 00001963 A0[8B15]                		mov	al, [sec_trk]

  5151

  5154                                  dohard:

  5157 000019A1 7459                    		jz	short static_configure

  5218                                  ;******************************************************************************
  5219                                  ; if more than 2 diskette drives on the system, then it is necessary to remap
  5220                                  ; the bds chain to adjust the logical drive num (drive letter) with greater
  5221                                  ; than two diskette drives
  5222                                  ;
  5223                                  ; new scheme:	if more than 2 disktte drives, first map the bds structure
  5224                                  ;		as usual and then rescan the bds chain to adjust the  drive
  5225                                  ;		letters. to do this, scan for disk drives and assign logical
  5226                                  ;		drive number starting from 2 and then rescan diskette drives
  5227                                  ;		and assign next to the last logical drive number of last disk
  5228                                  ;		drive to the 3rd and 4th diskette drives.
  5229                                  ;******************************************************************************

  5232                                  		;jbe	short static_configure ; no - no need for remapping
  5233 000019F7 7603                    		jbe	short no_remap
  5234 000019F9 E8D800                  		call	remap		; remap	bds chain to adjust driver letters
  5235                                  no_remap:

  5240                                  
  5241                                  ;we now decide, based on the configurations available so far, what
  5242                                  ;code or data we need to keep as a stay resident code. the following table
  5243                                  ;shows the configurations under consideration. they are listed in the order
  5244                                  ;of their current position memory.
  5245                                  ;
  5246                                  ;configuration will be done in two ways:
  5247                                  ;
  5248                                  ;first, we are going to set "static configuration". static configuration will
  5249                                  ;consider from basic configuration to endof96tpi configuration. the result
  5250                                  ;of static configuration will be the address the dynamic configuration will
  5251                                  ;use to start with.
  5252                                  ;
  5253                                  ;secondly, "dynamic configuration" will be performed. dynamic configuration
  5254                                  ;involves possible relocation of code or data. dynamic configuration routine
  5255                                  ;will take care of bdsm tables and at rom fix module thru k09 suspend/resume
  5256                                  ;code individually. after these operation, [dosdatasg] will be set.
  5257                                  ;this will be the place sysinit routine will relocate msdos module for good.
  5258

  5261                                  ;   1.	 basic configuration for msbio (endfloppy)

  5263                                  ;   3.	 end of bdss	; end of bdss for hard disks
  5264                                  ;   4.	 endatrom	;some of at rom fix module.
  5265                                  ;   5.	 endcmosclockset;supporting program for cmos clock write.

  5341                                  ; M065 -- begin changes
  5342                                  ;
  5343                                  ; On certain systems with Western Digital disk controllers, the
  5344                                  ; following detection scheme caused an unpredictable and serious
  5345                                  ; failure. In particular, they've implemented a nonstandard
  5346                                  ; Int13(ah=16h) which reconfigures the hard drive, depending on
  5347                                  ; what happens to be at es:[bx] and other memory locations indexed
  5348                                  ; off of it.
  5349                                  ;
  5350                                  ; Compaq was unable to tell us exactly which kind of systems have
  5351                                  ; the bug, except that they guarantee that the bug was fixed in
  5352                                  ; ROM BIOSs dated 08/04/86 and later. We'll check for the COMPAQ
  5353                                  ; string, and then look for date codes before 08/04/86 to decide
  5354                                  ; when to install the hook.

  5637                                  		pop	ds
  5638                                  loadit:
  5639                                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 46Dh
  5640                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; sysinit segment
  5641                                  		mov	es, ax
  5642                                  		mov	es, [es:CURRENTDOSLOCATION] ; 09/12/2022
  5643                                  		;mov	es, [es:271h]
  5644                                  
  5645                                  		call	getclus		; read cluster at ES:DI (DI is updated)
  5646                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5647                                  ;iseof:
  5648                                  		;;test	byte [cs:fbigfat], fbig
  5649                                  		;test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h ; fbig
  5650                                  		; 12/12/2023
  5651                                  		; ds = cs
  5652                                  		test	byte [fbigfat], 40h ; fbig
  5653                                  		jnz	short eofbig
  5654                                  		cmp	bx, 0FF7h
  5655                                  		jmp	short iseofx
  5656                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5657                                  
  5658                                  eofbig:
  5659                                  		cmp	bx, 0FFF7h
  5660                                  iseofx:
  5661                                  		jb	short loadit	; keep loading until cluster = eof
  5662                                  %endif
  5663                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5664                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5665                                  
  5666 00001ACC E8EA03                  		call	setdrvparms	; 
  5667                                  
  5668                                  		;;jmp	far ptr	46Dh:267h ; jmp	SYSINIT_SEG:SYSINIT_START
  5669                                  		;jmp	far 46Dh:267h
  5670 00001ACF EA[6902]2E04            		jmp	SYSINITSEG:SYSINITSTART
  5671                                  
  5672                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  5673                                  
  5674                                  ; Following are subroutines to support resident device driver initialization
  5675                                  ;
  5676                                  ;M011 -- note:  deleted setup_bdsms and reset_bdsms here
  5677                                  
  5678                                  ;	M035 -- begin changed section
  5679                                  
  5680                                  ;******************************************************************************
  5681                                  ; module name: remap
  5682                                  ;
  5683                                  ; descriptive name: all the code for himem that could be separated from msbio
  5684                                  ;
  5685                                  ; function:  remap the bds chain to adjusted logical drive numbers (drive
  5686                                  ;	     letters) if more than two diskette drives on the system.
  5687                                  ;
  5688                                  ;     scheme:  if more than 2 diskette drives, first map the bds structure
  5689                                  ;	       as usual and then rescan the bds chain to adjust the drive
  5690                                  ;	       letters. to do this, scan for disk drives and assign logical
  5691                                  ;	       drive number starting from 2 and then rescan diskette drives
  5692                                  ;	       and assign next to the last logical drive number of last disk
  5693                                  ;	       drive to the 3rd and 4th diskette drives.
  5694                                  
  5695                                  ; input:       none
  5696                                  ; exit:	drive letters have been remapped in bds chain
  5697                                  ; exit error:  none
  5698                                  ; called from: msinit
  5699                                  ;
  5700                                  ; notes:  this function  will be called only if more than 2 diskettes are
  5701                                  ;	  found in the system
  5702                                  ;	  this function assumes that there are no more than 26 drives assigned
  5703                                  ;	    this is guaranteed by the code that creates bdss for partitions
  5704                                  ;	  this function assumes that the first entries in the chain are
  5705                                  ;	   floppy drives, and all the rest are hard drives
  5706                                  ;	  will alter the boot drive if necessary to reflect remapping
  5707                                  ;
  5708                                  ;******************************************************************************
  5709                                  
  5710                                  ; 17/10/2022
  5711                                  ; 02/10/2022
  5712                                  
  5713                                  		; 15/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1) IBMBIO.COM
  5714                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2464h)
  5715                                  		; (MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:1D9Eh)
  5716                                  
  5717                                  remap:		; proc near
  5718                                  
  5719                                  		; 15/12/2023
  5720                                  		; ds = cs
  5721                                  		;mov	di, [cs:start_bds] ; get first bds
  5722 00001AD4 8B3E[1901]              		mov	di, [start_bds]
  5723                                  
  5724                                  ; search for 1st fixed disk physical drive num
  5725                                  
  5726                                  drive_loop:
  5727 00001AD8 807D0480                		cmp	byte [di+4], 80h ; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  5728                                  					; first	hard disk??
  5729 00001ADC 7409                    		jz	short fdrv_found ; yes,	continue
  5730 00001ADE 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5731                                  					; get next bds,	assume segment
  5732 00001AE0 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, -1 ; 0FFFFh	; last bds?
  5733 00001AE3 75F3                    		jnz	short drive_loop ; loop	if not
  5734 00001AE5 EB49                    		jmp	short rmap_exit	; yes, no hard drive on	system
  5735                                  
  5736                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5737                                  ;first disk drive bds, now change the logical drive num to 2 and the subsequent
  5738                                  ;logical drive nums to 3, 4, 5 etc.
  5739                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5740                                  
  5741                                  fdrv_found:
  5742 00001AE7 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; start	with logical drv num=2
  5743                                  fdrv_loop:
  5744 00001AE9 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  5745 00001AEC 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5746                                  					; ds:di--> next	bds
  5747                                  		;inc	al		; set num for next drive
  5748                                  		; 18/12/2022
  5749 00001AEE 40                      		inc	ax
  5750 00001AEF 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; last hard drive ?
  5751 00001AF2 75F5                    		jnz	short fdrv_loop	; no - assign more disk drives
  5752                                  
  5753                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5754                                  ; now, rescan and find bds of 3rd floppy drive and assign next drive letter
  5755                                  ; in al to 3rd. if the current drive letter is past z, then do not allocate
  5756                                  ; any more.
  5757                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5758                                  
  5759                                  		;mov	di, [cs:start_bds] ; [start_bds]
  5760                                  		; 15/12/2023
  5761 00001AF4 8B3E[1901]              		mov	di, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  5762 00001AF8 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5763                                  					; ds:di-->bds2
  5764                                  		;mov	ah, [cs:dsktnum] ; get number of floppies to remap
  5765 00001AFA 8A26[2501]              		mov	ah, [dsktnum]
  5766 00001AFE 80EC02                  		sub	ah, 2		; adjust for a:	& b:
  5767                                  remap_loop1:
  5768 00001B01 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5769                                  					; set new num to next floppy
  5770 00001B03 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  5771 00001B06 FEC0                    		inc	al		; new number for next floppy
  5772 00001B08 FECC                    		dec	ah		; count down extra floppies
  5773 00001B0A 75F5                    		jnz	short remap_loop1
  5774                                  
  5775                                  ; now we've got to adjust the boot drive if we reassigned it
  5776                                  
  5777                                  		; 15/12/2023
  5778                                  		;mov	al, [cs:drvfat]
  5779 00001B0C A0[8415]                		mov	al, [drvfat]
  5780 00001B0F 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; is it	a: or b: ?
  5781 00001B11 721D                    		jb	short rmap_exit
  5782                                  		;sub	al, [cs:dsktnum]
  5783 00001B13 2A06[2501]              		sub	al, [dsktnum]	; is it one of the other floppies?
  5784 00001B17 7204                    		jb	short remap_boot_flop ;	brif so
  5785                                  
  5786                                  ; we've got to remap the boot hard drive
  5787                                  ; subtract the number of EXTRA floppies from it
  5788                                  
  5789 00001B19 0402                    		add	al, 2		; bootdrv -= (dsktnum-2)
  5790 00001B1B EB04                    		jmp	short remap_change_boot_drv
  5791                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5792                                  
  5793                                  ; we've got to remap the boot floppy.
  5794                                  ; add the number of hard drive partitions to it
  5795                                  
  5796                                  remap_boot_flop:
  5797                                  		;add	al, [cs:drvmax]	; bootdrv += (drvmax-dsktnum)
  5798                                  		; 15/12/2023
  5799 00001B1D 0206[7500]              		add	al, [drvmax]
  5800                                  remap_change_boot_drv:			
  5801                                  		;mov	[cs:drvfat], al ; alter msdos.sys load drive
  5802 00001B21 A2[8415]                		mov	[drvfat], al
  5803 00001B24 FEC0                    		inc	al
  5804 00001B26 1E                      		push	ds
  5805 00001B27 BF2E04                  		mov	di, SYSINITSEG	; 46Dh
  5806                                  		;mov	di, 544h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
  5807                                  		;;mov	di, 46Dh	; SYSINIT segment
  5808 00001B2A 8EDF                    		mov	ds, di
  5809 00001B2C A2[9802]                		mov	[DEFAULTDRIVE], al
  5810                                  		;mov	ds:296h, al	; [SYSINIT+DEFAULT_DRIVE]
  5811                                  					; pass it to sysinit as	well
  5812 00001B2F 1F                      		pop	ds ; ds = cs
  5813                                  rmap_exit:
  5814 00001B30 C3                      		retn
  5815                                  
  5816                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  5817                                  
  5818                                  ; 17/10/2022
  5819                                  ; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0 -actual-)
  5820                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21 -draft-)
  5821                                  ; 02/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0 (MSDOS 3.3)	
  5822                                  ; 19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0 (MSDOS 2.11)
  5823                                  ;**************************************************
  5824                                  ; getboot - get the boot sector for a hard disk
  5825                                  ;
  5826                                  ; Reads the boot sector from a specified drive into
  5827                                  ; a buffer at the top of memory.
  5828                                  ;
  5829                                  ; dl = int13 drive number to read boot sector for
  5830                                  ;**************************************************
  5831                                  
  5832                                  ; 17/10/2022
  5833                                  bootbias equ 200h
  5834                                  
  5835                                  getboot:	; proc near
  5836                                  
  5837                                  		; 15/12/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 
  5838                                  		;	 (Modified MSDOS 6.22) IO.SYS
  5839                                  		; ds = cs
  5840                                  		
  5841                                  		; 08/04/2018
  5842                                  		; Retro DOS v2.0 (IBMBIO.COM, IBMDOS 2.1)
  5843                                  		; 28/03/2018 - MSDOS 6.0 - MSINIT.ASM, 1991
  5844                                  		; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0
  5845                                  		;	      (disassembled IO.SYS code of MSDOS 5.0)
  5846                                  
  5847                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:init_bootseg] ; 17/10/2022
  5848                                  		; 15/12/2023
  5849 00001B31 A1[8715]                		mov	ax, [init_bootseg]
  5850 00001B34 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  5851                                  
  5852                                  		; 17/10/2022
  5853 00001B36 BB0002                  		mov	bx, bootbias ; 200h
  5854                                  		;mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  5855                                  					; load BX, ES:BX is where sector goes
  5856 00001B39 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  5857 00001B3C 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
  5858 00001B3E B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
  5859 00001B41 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  5860                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  5861                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  5862                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  5863 00001B43 7209                    		jb	short erret
  5864                                  		; 17/10/2022
  5865 00001B45 26813EFE0355AA          		cmp	word [es:bootbias+1FEh], 0AA55h
  5866                                  		;cmp	word ptr es:3FEh, 0AA55h ; [es:bootbias+1FEh]
  5867                                  					; Dave Litton magic word?
  5868 00001B4C 7401                    		jz	short norm_ret	; yes
  5869                                  erret:
  5870 00001B4E F9                      		stc
  5871                                  norm_ret:
  5872 00001B4F C3                      		retn
  5873                                  
  5874                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  5875                                  
  5876                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 
  5877                                  
  5878                                  ;***************************************************************************
  5879                                  ;   sethard - generate bpb for a variable sized hard file. ibm has a
  5880                                  ;   partitioned hard file; we must read physical sector 0 to determine where
  5881                                  ;   our own logical sectors start. we also read in our boot sector to
  5882                                  ;   determine version number
  5883                                  ;
  5884                                  ;   inputs:	dl is rom drive number (80...)
  5885                                  ;		bh is partition number (0....) 
  5886                                  ;		ds:di points to bds
  5887                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear -> bpb is filled in
  5888                                  ;		carry set   -> bpb is left uninitialized due to error
  5889                                  ;	trashes (at least) si, cx
  5890                                  ;	MUST PRESERVE ES:!!!!
  5891                                  ;***************************************************************************
  5892                                  
  5893                                  sethard:	; proc near
  5894                                  		; 12/08/2023
  5895                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA
  5896 00001B50 57                      		push	di
  5897 00001B51 53                      		push	bx
  5898                                  		;push	ds  ; ds = cs = BIOSDATA ; 12/08/2023
  5899 00001B52 06                      		push	es
  5900 00001B53 885D05                  		mov	[di+5],	bl	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  5901 00001B56 885504                  		mov	[di+4],	dl	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  5902 00001B59 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  5903                                  					; fnon_removable
  5904 00001B5D C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  5905                                  					; ffHardFile
  5906 00001B61 C606[8615]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit FAT
  5907 00001B66 88FE                    		mov	dh, bh		; partition number
  5908 00001B68 52                      		push	dx
  5909 00001B69 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  5910 00001B6B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  5911                                  					; DL = drive number
  5912                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  5913                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  5914                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  5915 00001B6D FEC6                    		inc	dh
  5916 00001B6F 887515                  		mov	[di+15h], dh	; [di+BDS.heads] ; get number of heads
  5917 00001B72 5A                      		pop	dx
  5918 00001B73 7263                    		jb	short setret	; error	if no hard disk
  5919 00001B75 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  5920 00001B78 884D13                  		mov	[di+13h], cl	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  5921 00001B7B 52                      		push	dx		; save partition number
  5922 00001B7C E8B2FF                  		call	getboot
  5923 00001B7F 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore partition number
  5924 00001B80 7256                    		jb	short setret
  5925 00001B82 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  5926                                  
  5927                                  ; The first 'active' partition is 00, the second is 01....
  5928                                  ;   then the remainder of the 'primary' but non-active partitions
  5929                                  
  5930                                  act_part:
  5931 00001B85 26F647FC80              		test	byte [es:bx-4], 80h ; is the partition active?
  5932 00001B8A 7418                    		jz	short no_act	; no
  5933 00001B8C 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; reject if partitiontype != 1, 4 or 6
  5934 00001B90 740C                    		jz	short got_good_act
  5935 00001B92 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4
  5936 00001B96 7406                    		jz	short got_good_act
  5937 00001B98 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6
  5938 00001B9C 7506                    		jnz	short no_act
  5939                                  got_good_act:				; 11/08/2023
  5940 00001B9E 08F6                    		or	dh, dh		; is this our target partition #?
  5941                                  					; (0 = first primary dos or active partition)
  5942 00001BA0 743A                    		jz	short set2	; WE GOT THE ONE WANTED!!
  5943 00001BA2 FECE                    		dec	dh		; count	down
  5944                                  no_act:					
  5945 00001BA4 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  5946 00001BA7 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  5947                                  					; last entry done?
  5948 00001BAB 75D8                    		jnz	short act_part	; no, process next entry
  5949 00001BAD BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  5950                                  					; restore original value of bx
  5951                                  
  5952                                  ; Now scan the non-active partitions
  5953                                  
  5954                                  get_primary:
  5955 00001BB0 26F647FC80              		test	byte [es:bx-4], 80h
  5956 00001BB5 7518                    		jnz	short not_prim	; we've already scanned
  5957                                  					; the ACTIVE ones
  5958 00001BB7 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; see if partitiontype == 1, 4 or 6
  5959 00001BBB 740C                    		jz	short got_prim
  5960 00001BBD 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4
  5961 00001BC1 7406                    		jz	short got_prim
  5962 00001BC3 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6
  5963 00001BC7 7506                    		jnz	short not_prim
  5964                                  got_prim:
  5965 00001BC9 08F6                    		or	dh, dh		; is this our target partition?
  5966 00001BCB 740F                    		jz	short set2
  5967 00001BCD FECE                    		dec	dh
  5968                                  not_prim:
  5969 00001BCF 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  5970 00001BD2 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  5971 00001BD6 75D8                    		jnz	short get_primary ; loop till we've gone through table
  5972                                  setret:					
  5973 00001BD8 F9                      		stc			; error	return
  5974 00001BD9 E99A02                  		jmp	ret_hard_err
  5975                                  
  5976                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5977                                  
  5978                                  ;  until we get the real logical boot record and get the bpb,
  5979                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be used instead of BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS
  5980                                  ;  for the convenience of the computation.
  5981                                  ;
  5982                                  ;  at the end of this procedure, if a bpb information is gotten from
  5983                                  ;  the valid boot record, then we are going to use those bpb information
  5984                                  ;  without change.
  5985                                  ;
  5986                                  ;  otherwise, if (hidden sectors + total sectors) <= a word, then we will move
  5987                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS (low) to BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS and zero out
  5988                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS entry to make it a conventional bpb format.
  5989                                  
  5990                                  set2:		
  5991                                  		; 12/08/2023
  5992                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment (0070h)
  5993 00001BDC 8816[8915]              		mov	[rom_drv_num], dl
  5994                                  		;mov	[cs:rom_drv_num], dl
  5995                                  			; save the rom bios drive number we are handling now.
  5996 00001BE0 268B4704                		mov	ax, [es:bx+4]	; hidden sectors (start	sector)
  5997 00001BE4 268B5706                		mov	dx, [es:bx+6]
  5998                                  
  5999                                  ; decrement the sector count by 1 to make it zero based. exactly 64k
  6000                                  ; sectors should be allowed	
  6001                                  
  6002 00001BE8 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1
  6003 00001BEB 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0
  6004 00001BEE 26034708                		add	ax, [es:bx+8]	; sectors in partition
  6005 00001BF2 2613570A                		adc	dx, [es:bx+10]
  6006 00001BF6 7305                    		jnb	short okdrive
  6007 00001BF8 800E[8615]80            		or	byte [fbigfat], 80h ; ftoobig
  6008                                  okdrive:
  6009 00001BFD 268B4704                		mov	ax, [es:bx+4]
  6010 00001C01 894517                  		mov	[di+17h], ax	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs]
  6011                                  					; BPB_HIDDENSECTORS = p->partitionbegin
  6012 00001C04 268B4706                		mov	ax, [es:bx+6]
  6013 00001C08 894519                  		mov	[di+19h], ax	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
  6014 00001C0B 268B570A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+10]	; # of sectors (high)
  6015 00001C0F 268B4708                		mov	ax, [es:bx+8]	; # of sectors (low)
  6016 00001C13 89551D                  		mov	[di+1Dh], dx	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  6017 00001C16 89451B                  		mov	[di+1Bh], ax	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  6018                                  					; bpb->maxsec =	p->partitionlength
  6019 00001C19 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  6020 00001C1C 7705                    		ja	short okdrive_1
  6021 00001C1E 83F840                  		cmp	ax, 64		; if (p->partitionlength < 64)
  6022 00001C21 72B5                    		jb	short setret	; return -1;
  6023                                  okdrive_1:
  6024 00001C23 8B5519                  		mov	dx, [di+19h]	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
  6025 00001C26 8B4517                  		mov	ax, [di+17h]	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs]
  6026 00001C29 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; boot sector number - for mini	disk
  6027                                  					; usually equal	to the # of sec/trk.
  6028 00001C2B 8A5D13                  		mov	bl, [di+13h]	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  6029 00001C2E 50                      		push	ax
  6030 00001C2F 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  6031 00001C31 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  6032 00001C33 F7F3                    		div	bx		; (sectors)dx:ax / (BDS.secpertrack)bx =
  6033                                  					; (track)temp_h:ax + (sector)dx
  6034                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6035                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_h], ax
  6036                                  		; 12/08/2023 (ds=cs)

  6653 00001E1C B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 (2^4) directory entries per sector
  6654 00001E1E 52                      		push	dx		; save total sectors (high)

  6657 00001E24 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx

  6660 00001E2A 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1

  6672                                  		; December 2000, Page 21)

  6675                                  		; 8/8/2023 (Retro DOS v5.0)

  6678                                  		; FATsz	= (TmpVal1+(TmpVal2-1))/TmpVal2
  6679                                  		; 8/8/2023 (Retro DOS v5.0)
  6680                                  		; If(FATType == FAT32) {
  6681                                  		;   BPB_FATSz16 = 0;
  6682                                  		;   BPB_FATSz32 = FATSz;
  6683                                  		;} else {
  6684                                  		;   BPB_FATSz16 = LOWORD(FATSz);
  6685                                  		;/* there is no BPB_FATSz32 in a FAT16 BPB */
  6686                                  		;}

  6689 00001E37 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2

  6691 00001E3D 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2-1
  6692

  6694

  6696                                  					; ceil((total-dir-res)/(256*BDS.secperclus+2))

  7062                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7063                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0

  7066                                  
  7067                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7068                                  ;
  7069                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7070                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7071                                  ;
  7072                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7073                                  ;
  7074                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7075                                  ;   initialize it.
  7076                                  ;
  7077                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7078                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7079                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7080                                  ;
  7081                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7082                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7083                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7084                                  ;
  7085                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7086                                  ;   save coding.
  7087                                  ;
  7088                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7089                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7090                                  ;
  7091                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7092                                  ;
  7093                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7094                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7095                                  ;
  7096                                  ; called modules:
  7097                                  ;		  getboot
  7098                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7099                                  ;
  7100                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7101                                  ;
  7102                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7103                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7104                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7105                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7106                                  ;
  7107                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7108                                  
  7109                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7110                                  domini:	
  7111 00001F83 8A36[FD15]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7112                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7113 00001F87 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7114                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7115 00001F89 7430                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7116 00001F8B B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7117                                  domini_loop:				
  7118 00001F8D 52                      		push	dx
  7119 00001F8E 8816[FC15]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7120 00001F92 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7121 00001F94 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7122                                  					; DL = drive number
  7123                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7124                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7125                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7126                                  		
  7127                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7128                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B36h
  7129                                  		;inc	dh
  7130                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  7131                                  		;mov	al, dh
  7132 00001F96 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7133 00001F98 88F0                    		mov	al, dh	; <= 255
  7134 00001F9A 40                      		inc	ax	; (0FFh -> 100h)
  7135 00001F9B A3[0216]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7136                                  		;and	cl, 3Fh
  7137                                  		;mov	al, cl
  7138                                  		; 08/08/2023
  7139 00001F9E 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7140 00001FA0 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh
  7141 00001FA3 A3[0416]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7142 00001FA6 06                      		push	es
  7143 00001FA7 8A16[FC15]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7144 00001FAB E883FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7145                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7146 00001FAE 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7147 00001FB0 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7148                                  domininext:				
  7149 00001FB3 07                      		pop	es
  7150 00001FB4 5A                      		pop	dx
  7151 00001FB5 FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7152 00001FB7 FECE                    		dec	dh
  7153 00001FB9 75D2                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7154                                  dominiret:				
  7155 00001FBB C3                      		retn
  7156                                  
  7157                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7158                                  
  7159                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7160                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7161                                  
  7162                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7163                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7164                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7165                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7166                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7167                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7168                                  ;
  7169                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7170                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7171                                  
  7172                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7173 00001FBC 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7174                                  fmpnext:				
  7175 00001FC0 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7176 00001FC4 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7177 00001FC6 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7178 00001FC9 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7179 00001FCD 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7180                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7181                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7182                                  fmpnextfound:
  7183 00001FCF C3                      		retn
  7184                                  
  7185                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7186                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7187                                  ;fmpret:
  7188                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7189                                  
  7190                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7191                                  
  7192                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7193                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7194 00001FD0 E8A500                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7195 00001FD3 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7196 00001FD5 8B3E[0016]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free bds
  7197 00001FD9 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7198                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7199 00001FDE 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7200                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7201                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7202 00001FE2 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7203                                  					; ffHardFile
  7204 00001FE6 C606[8615]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7205 00001FEB A1[0216]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7206 00001FEE 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7207 00001FF1 A1[0416]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7208 00001FF4 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7209 00001FF7 A0[FC15]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7210 00001FFA 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7211                                  					; set physical number
  7212 00001FFD A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7213 00002000 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7214                                  					; set logical number
  7215 00002003 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7216 00002008 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7217 0000200A 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7218                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7219 0000200F 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7220                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7221                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7222 00002011 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7223 00002014 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7224 00002018 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7225 0000201B D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7226 0000201D D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7227 0000201F 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7228 00002023 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7229                                  					; set hidden trks

  7231 0000202A 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7232 0000202E 8A16[FC15]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7233 00002032 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7234 00002035 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7235 00002038 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7236                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7237                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7238                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7239 0000203A 7293                    		jc	short fmpnextfound
  7240 0000203C BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7241                                  
  7242                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7243                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2C7Ch
  7244 0000203F 26817F3C55AA            		cmp	word [es:bx+3Ch], 0AA55h ; 03C2h+03Ch = 3FEh
  7245 00002045 7588                    		jne	short fmpnextfound ; not a valid boot sector !
  7246

  7248                                  		;push	es
  7249 00002047 E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7250                                  					; bx value saved.
  7251                                  		;pop	es  ; 13/08/2023
  7252 0000204A 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  7253 0000204C E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7254                                  fmpnextchain:
  7255 0000204F E96EFF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7256                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7257                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

  7269                                  	
  7270 00002052 57                      		push	di
  7271 00002053 53                      		push	bx

  7303                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.

  7340                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7341                                  ;								 
  7342                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7343                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7344                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.

  7350                                  xinstall_bds_1:

  7352 00002096 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ; skip ahead if so

  7354 00002098 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7355 0000209A EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1

  7363                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7364 000020A1 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7365                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7366 000020A5 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7367                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7368                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7369 000020A8 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7370 000020AB 8B36[FE15]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]

  7372 000020B1 8306[FE15]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7373 000020B6 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]

  7375 000020BF 5B                      		pop	bx

  7380                                  
  7381                                  ; 17/10/2022

  7383                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
