  8200                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8201                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8202                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8203                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8204                                  
  8205                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8206                                  
  8207                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8208                                  
  8209                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8210                                  
  8211                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8212                                  
  8213                                  ;************************************************************************
  8214                                  ;*									*
  8215                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8216                                  ;*									*
  8217                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8218                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8219                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8220                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8221                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8222                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8223                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8224                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8225                                  ;*									*
  8226                                  ;************************************************************************
  8227                                  
  8228                                  
  8229                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8230                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00E3h)
  8231                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8232 000000E3 00                      		db 0
  8233                                  
  8234                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8235 000000E4 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8236                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8237 000000E5 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8238                                  					; 00 init
  8239 000000E7 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8240 000000E9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8241 000000EB [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8242                                  					; 03
  8243 000000ED [5C01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8244                                  					; 04
  8245 000000EF [9F01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8246                                  					; 05
  8247 000000F1 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8248 000000F3 [0802]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8249                                  					; 07
  8250 000000F5 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8251                                  					; 08
  8252 000000F7 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8253 000000F9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8254                                  con_table_end:
  8255 000000FB 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8256                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8257 000000FC [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8258 000000FE [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8259 00000100 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8260 00000102 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8261 00000104 [1902]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8262                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8263 00000106 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8264                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8265 00000108 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8266 0000010A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8267 0000010C [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8268 0000010E [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8269 00000110 [4F02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8270 00000112 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8271 00000114 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8272 00000116 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8273 00000118 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8274 0000011A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8275 0000011C [8902]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8276 0000011E [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8277 00000120 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8278 00000122 [B702]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8279 00000124 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8280 00000126 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8281 00000128 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8282 0000012A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8283 0000012C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8284 0000012E [EC02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8285                                  prn_table_end:
  8286 00000130 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8287                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8288 00000131 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8289 00000133 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8290 00000135 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8291 00000137 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8292 00000139 [0703]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8293 0000013B [2C03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8294 0000013D [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8295 0000013F [6203]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8296 00000141 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8297 00000143 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8298 00000145 [4C03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8299                                  aux_table_end:
  8300 00000147 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8301                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8302 00000148 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8303 0000014A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8304 0000014C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8305 0000014E [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8306 00000150 [CE04]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8307 00000152 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8308 00000154 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8309 00000156 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8310 00000158 [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8311 0000015A [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8312                                  tim_table_end:
  8313                                  
  8314                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8315                                  
  8316                                  ;************************************************************************
  8317                                  ;*									*
  8318                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8319                                  ;*									*
  8320                                  ;************************************************************************
  8321                                  
  8322                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8323                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8324 0000015C E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8325                                  con_loop:				
  8326 0000015E E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8327 00000161 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8328 00000162 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8329                                  con_exit:				
  8330 00000164 F8                      		clc
  8331 00000165 C3                      		retn
  8332                                  
  8333                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8334                                  
  8335                                  ;************************************************************************
  8336                                  ;*									*
  8337                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8338                                  ;*									*
  8339                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8340                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8341                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8342                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8343                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8344                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8345                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8346                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8347                                  ;*									*
  8348                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8349                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8350                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8351                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8352                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8353                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8354                                  ;*									*
  8355                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8356                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8357                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8358                                  ;*									*
  8359                                  ;************************************************************************
  8360                                  
  8361                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8362                                  chrin:		
  8363 00000166 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8364 0000016A 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8365 0000016C 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8366 00000170 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8367 00000172 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8368 00000174 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8369 00000176 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8370 00000178 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8371 0000017A 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8372 0000017D 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8373 0000017F B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8374 00000181 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8375                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8376                                  
  8377                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8378                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8379                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8380                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8381                                  ;      else
  8382                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8383                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8384                                  ;      endif
  8385                                  ;    endif
  8386                                  ;  endif
  8387                                  
  8388                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8389 00000183 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8390 00000188 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8391 0000018A 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8392 0000018C 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8393 0000018E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8394 00000190 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8395 00000192 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8396 00000194 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8397                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8398                                  
  8399                                  not_ext:				
  8400 00000196 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8401 00000198 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8402                                  alt_save:				
  8403 0000019A 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8404                                  keyret:					
  8405 0000019E C3                      		retn
  8406                                  
  8407                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8408                                  
  8409                                  ;************************************************************************
  8410                                  ;*									*
  8411                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8412                                  ;*									*
  8413                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8414                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8415                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8416                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8417                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8418                                  ;*									*
  8419                                  ;************************************************************************
  8420                                  
  8421                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8422                                  con_rdnd:				
  8423 0000019F A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8424 000001A2 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8425 000001A4 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8426 000001A6 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8427 000001AA CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8428 000001AC 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8429 000001AE 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8430 000001B3 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8431 000001B5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8432                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8433 000001B9 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8434                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8435 000001BE 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8436 000001C0 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8437 000001C3 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8438 000001C5 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8439                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8440                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8441                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8442                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8443 000001C7 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8444 000001C8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8445 000001CA C3                      		retn
  8446                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8447                                  
  8448                                  gotchr:					
  8449 000001CB 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8450 000001CD 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8451 000001CF 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8452 000001D3 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8453 000001D5 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8454                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8455                                  
  8456                                  notbrk:					
  8457 000001D7 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8458 000001DA 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8459 000001DC B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8460 000001DE EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8461                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8462                                  
  8463                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8464 000001E0 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8465 000001E5 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8466 000001E7 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8467 000001E9 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8468 000001EB 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8469 000001EE 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8470 000001F0 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8471                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8472                                  rdexit:					
  8473 000001F2 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8474 000001F6 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8475                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8476                                  bc_exvec:				
  8477 000001FA F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8478                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8479 000001FB C3                      		retn
  8480                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8481                                  
  8482                                  ;************************************************************************
  8483                                  ;*									*
  8484                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8485                                  ;*									*
  8486                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8487                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8488                                  ;*									*
  8489                                  ;************************************************************************
  8490                                  
  8491                                  con_writ:
  8492                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8493 000001FC E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8494                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8495                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8496                                  con_lp:					
  8497 000001FE 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8498 00000201 47                      		inc	di
  8499 00000202 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8500                                  					; AL = character to display
  8501 00000204 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8502                                  cc_ret:					
  8503 00000206 F8                      		clc
  8504 00000207 C3                      		retn
  8505                                  
  8506                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8507                                  
  8508                                  ;************************************************************************
  8509                                  ;*									*
  8510                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8511                                  ;*									*
  8512                                  ;************************************************************************
  8513                                  
  8514                                  con_flush:
  8515 00000208 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8516                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8517 0000020D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8518 0000020F CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8519                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8520                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8521                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8522 00000211 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8523 00000213 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8524 00000215 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8525                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8526 00000217 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8527                                  
  8528                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8529                                  
  8530                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8531                                  
  8532                                  ;************************************************************************
  8533                                  ;*									*
  8534                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8535                                  ;*									*
  8536                                  ;************************************************************************
  8537                                  
  8538                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8539                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8540                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8541                                  
  8542                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8543                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8544                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8545                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8546                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8547                                  ;
  8548                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8549                                  
  8550                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8551                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8552                                  
  8553                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8554                                  
  8555                                  ;************************************************************************
  8556                                  ;*									*
  8557                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8558                                  ;*									*
  8559                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8560                                  ;*									*
  8561                                  ;************************************************************************
  8562                                  
  8563                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8564 00000219 E8BBFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8565                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8566                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8567                                  prn_done:
  8568 0000021C F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8569 0000021D C3                      		retn
  8570                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8571                                  
  8572                                  ;************************************************************************
  8573                                  ;*									*
  8574                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8575                                  ;*									*
  8576                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8577                                  ;*									*
  8578                                  ;************************************************************************
  8579                                  
  8580                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8581                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8582 0000021E E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8583                                  prn_loop:				
  8584 00000220 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8585                                  prn_out:				
  8586 00000223 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8587 00000226 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8588 00000228 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8589 0000022B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8590 0000022D E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8591 00000230 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8592 00000232 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8593 00000235 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8594 00000237 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8595 00000239 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8596 0000023E EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8597                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8598                                  
  8599                                  _prnwf:					
  8600 00000240 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8601 00000243 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8602                                  TestPrnError:				
  8603 00000245 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8604 00000246 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8605                                  pmessg:					
  8606 00000248 E98CFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8607                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8608                                  
  8609                                  prn_con:				
  8610 0000024B 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8611 0000024C E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8612                                  ;prn_done:				
  8613                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8614                                  prn_done2:
  8615                                  		;clc
  8616                                  		; cf=0
  8617 0000024E C3                      		retn
  8618                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8619                                  
  8620                                  ;************************************************************************
  8621                                  ;*									*
  8622                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8623                                  ;*									*
  8624                                  ;************************************************************************
  8625                                  
  8626                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8627 0000024F E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8628 00000252 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8629 00000254 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8630                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8631                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8632 00000257 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8633 00000259 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8634                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8635                                  
  8636                                  ;************************************************************************
  8637                                  ;*									*
  8638                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8639                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8640                                  ;*									*
  8641                                  ;************************************************************************
  8642                                  
  8643                                  prnstat:				
  8644 0000025C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8645                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8646                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8647                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8648                                  
  8649                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8650                                  
  8651                                  ;************************************************************************
  8652                                  ;*									*
  8653                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8654                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8655                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8656                                  ;*									*
  8657                                  ;************************************************************************
  8658                                  
  8659                                  prnop:	
  8660 0000025E 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8661 00000262 CD17                    		int	17h		
  8662                                  
  8663                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8664                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8665                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8666                                  
  8667 00000264 50                      		push	ax
  8668 00000265 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8669 00000268 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8670 0000026B 58                      		pop	ax
  8671 0000026C 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8672 0000026E 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8673 00000271 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8674                                  
  8675                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8676                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8677                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8678                                  
  8679                                  NextTest:				
  8680 00000274 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8681                                  					; i/o error?
  8682 00000277 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8683                                  
  8684                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8685                                  
  8686 00000279 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8687                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8688 0000027B F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8689 0000027E 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8690 00000280 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8691                                  ret1:					
  8692 00000282 C3                      		retn
  8693                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8694                                  
  8695                                  checknotready:				
  8696 00000283 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8697 00000285 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8698 00000288 C3                      		retn
  8699                                  
  8700                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8701                                  
  8702                                  ;************************************************************************
  8703                                  ;*									*
  8704                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8705                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8706                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8707                                  ;*									*
  8708                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8709                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8710                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8711                                  ;*									*
  8712                                  ;************************************************************************
  8713                                  
  8714                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8715                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8716 00000289 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8717                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8718 0000028B 51                      		push	cx
  8719 0000028C 53                      		push	bx
  8720 0000028D 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8721 0000028F 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8722 00000293 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8723                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8724 00000295 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8725 00000299 5B                      		pop	bx
  8726                                  prn_getstat:				
  8727 0000029A E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8728 0000029D 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8729 0000029F F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8730 000002A2 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8731 000002A4 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8732 000002A5 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8733 000002A7 26                      		es
  8734 000002A8 AC                      		lodsb
  8735                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8736                                  					; lodsb
  8737 000002A9 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8738 000002AB E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8739 000002AE 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8740 000002B0 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8741                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8742                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8743                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8744 000002B2 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8745                                  
  8746                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8747                                  
  8748                                  prn_bperr:				
  8749 000002B3 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8750                                  prn_berr:				
  8751 000002B4 E920FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8752                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8753                                  
  8754                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8755                                  
  8756                                  ;************************************************************************
  8757                                  ;*									*
  8758                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8759                                  ;*									*
  8760                                  ;************************************************************************
  8761                                  
  8762                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8763                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8764                                  
  8765                                  ;********************************;*
  8766                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8767                                  ;********************************;*
  8768                                  
  8769                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8770                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8771                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8772                                  
  8773                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8774                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8775                                  ;;endstruc
  8776                                  
  8777                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8778                                  
  8779                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8780                                  
  8781                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8782                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8783 000002B7 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8784 000002BB 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8785                                  					; ioc_pc
  8786 000002C0 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8787                                  
  8788                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8789 000002C2 E910FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8790                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8791                                  
  8792                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8793 000002C5 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8794 000002C9 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8795 000002CD 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8796                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8797 000002CF 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8798 000002D3 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8799                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8800 000002D5 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8801 000002D9 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8802 000002DB 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8803 000002DD 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8804 000002DF 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8805 000002E1 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8806                                  prngetcount:				
  8807                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8808 000002E4 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8809 000002E8 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8810                                  					; return current retry count
  8811                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8812                                  		; cf=0
  8813                                  		;clc
  8814 000002EB C3                      		retn
  8815                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8816                                  
  8817                                  ;************************************************************************
  8818                                  ;*									*
  8819                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  8820                                  ;*									*
  8821                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
  8822                                  ;************************************************************************
  8823                                  
  8824                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h

  8827                                  					; ioc_pc

  8829 000002F7 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8830 000002FB 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  8831 000002FD 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported

  8845                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8846                                  
  8847                                  ;************************************************************************
  8848                                  ;*									*
  8849                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8850                                  ;*									*
  8851                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8852                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8853                                  ;*									*
  8854                                  ;************************************************************************
  8855                                  
  8856                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8857                                  
  8858                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8859                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8860                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8861                                  
  8862                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8863                                  
  8864                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8865                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8866                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8867                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8868                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8869                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8870                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8871                                  
  8872                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8873                                  
  8874                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8875                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8876                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8877                                  
  8878                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8879                                  
  8880                                  ;************************************************************************
  8881                                  ;*									*
  8882                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8883                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8884                                  ;*									*
  8885                                  ;************************************************************************
  8886                                  
  8887                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8888                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8889 00000307 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8890 00000309 E87500                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8891 0000030C 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8892 0000030E 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8893 00000310 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8894 00000312 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8895                                  aux1:					
  8896 00000314 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8897                                  					; won't return if error
  8898                                  aux2:					
  8899 00000317 AA                      		stosb
  8900 00000318 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8901                                  exvec2:					
  8902 0000031A F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  8903                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  8904 0000031B C3                      		retn
  8905                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8906                                  
  8907                                  ;************************************************************************
  8908                                  ;*									*
  8909                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8910                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8911                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8912                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8913                                  ;*									*
  8914                                  ;************************************************************************
  8915                                  
  8916                                  auxin:					
  8917 0000031C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  8918 0000031E E83A00                  		call	auxop
  8919 00000321 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8920                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8921                                  		;retn
  8922                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8923 00000324 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  8924                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8925                                  
  8926                                  arbad:					
  8927 00000326 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  8928                                  		;xor	al, al
  8929                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8930                                  		; 11/08/2023
  8931 00000327 B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
  8932 00000329 E9ABFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8933                                  
  8934                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8935                                  
  8936                                  ;************************************************************************
  8937                                  ;*									*
  8938                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8939                                  ;*									*
  8940                                  ;************************************************************************
  8941                                  
  8942                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  8943 0000032C E85200                  		call	getbx
  8944 0000032F 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  8945 00000331 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  8946 00000333 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8947 00000335 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device

  8949 0000033B 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8950 0000033D A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8951 0000033F 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8952 00000341 E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8953 00000344 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8954                                  auxdrx:

  8957

  8973 00000356 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8974                                  		; 12/12/2022

  8976                                  		;clc

  8980                                  ;************************************************************************
  8981                                  ;*									*

  8983                                  ;*									*
  8984                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  8985                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8986                                  ;*									*

  8991                                  
  8992                                  		; fall into auxop
  8993                                  
  8994                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8995                                  
  8996                                  ;************************************************************************
  8997                                  ;*									*
  8998                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  8999                                  ;*									*
  9000                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  9001                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  9002                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*

  9007 0000035B 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  9008                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  9009                                  					; get port number

  9011                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  9012                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  9013 00000361 C3                      		retn
  9014                                  
  9015                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9016                                  
  9017                                  ;************************************************************************
  9018                                  ;*									*
  9019                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  9020                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  9021                                  ;*									*
  9022                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  9023                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  9024                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  9025                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  9026                                  ;*									*

  9032                                  					; zero out buffer
  9033                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9034                                  		; 12/12/2022

  9036 00000368 C3                      		retn

  9038

  9063                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return

  9090                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9091                                  ;								:
  9092                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  9093                                  ;								:
  9094                                  ;								:
  9095                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  9096                                  ;								:
  9097                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  9098                                  ;								:
  9099                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  9100                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  9101                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  9102                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  9103                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  9104                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  9105                                  ;								:
  9106                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  9107                                  ;								:
  9108                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  9109                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  9110                                  ;								:
  9111                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9112                                  
  9113                                  ; convert time to ticks
  9114                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  9115                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  9116                                  
  9117                                  ;19/07/2019
  9118                                  ;09/03/2019
  9119                                  
  9120                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  9121                                  
  9122                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  9123                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  9124                                  
  9125 0000038A B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  9126 0000038C F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  9127 0000038E B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9128 00000390 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  9129 00000392 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  9130 00000395 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  9131 00000397 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  9132 00000399 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  9133 0000039B B064                    		mov	al, 100
  9134 0000039D F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  9135 0000039F 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  9136 000003A1 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  9137 000003A4 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  9138 000003A6 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  9139 000003A8 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9140                                  
  9141                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  9142                                  
  9143 000003AB 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9144 000003AC 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  9145 000003AD BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  9146 000003B0 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  9147 000003B2 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  9148 000003B4 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  9149 000003B5 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  9150 000003B7 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  9151 000003B9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9152 000003BC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  9153 000003BD BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  9154 000003C0 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  9155 000003C2 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  9156 000003C4 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9157 000003C6 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  9158 000003C8 98                      		cbw
  9159 000003C9 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  9160 000003CA F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  9161 000003CC 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  9162 000003CE CB                      		retf			; far return
  9163                                  
  9164                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9165                                  
  9166                                  ; 17/10/2022
  9167                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9168                                  
  9169                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9170                                  ;
  9171                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  9172                                  ;
  9173                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  9174                                  ;
  9175                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  9176                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  9177                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  9178                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  9179                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  9180                                  ;
  9181                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  9182                                  ;
  9183                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9184                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9185                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9186                                  ;
  9187                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9188                                  
  9189                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  9190                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:03EAh
  9191                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  9192 000003CF 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  9193 000003D2 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  9194                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  9195 000003D3 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9196                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9197 000003D8 7423                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  9198 000003DA 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  9199                                  					; get binary hours
  9200                                  					; convert to bcd
  9201                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9202                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  9203                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9204 000003DE E8E800                  		call	bintobcd
  9205 000003E1 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  9206 000003E3 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  9207                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9208                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  9209 000003E7 E8DF00                  		call	bintobcd
  9210 000003EA 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  9211 000003EC 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  9212                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9213                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd
  9214 000003F0 E8D600                  		call	bintobcd
  9215                                  
  9216 000003F3 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  9217 000003F5 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  9218 000003F7 FA                      		cli
  9219 000003F8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  9220 000003FA CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9221                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  9222                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  9223                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9224 000003FC FB                      		sti
  9225                                  no_cmos_1:				
  9226 000003FD 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  9227 00000401 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  9228                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9229 00000405 FF1E[C106]              		call	far [ttticks]
  9230                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  9231                                  					; convert time to ticks
  9232                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  9233 00000409 FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  9234 0000040A B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  9235 0000040C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  9236                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  9237                                  					; Return: time of day set
  9238                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  9239 0000040E 8F06[F004]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  9240 00000412 FB                      		sti
  9241                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9242 00000413 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9243 00000418 7409                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  9244                                  
  9245                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9246                                  		;call	far [daycnttoday]
  9247                                  		;;call	ds:daycnttoday	; call far [daycnttoday]
  9248                                  					; convert to bcd format
  9249 0000041A E80700                  		call	daycnttoday
  9250                                  
  9251 0000041D FA                      		cli
  9252 0000041E B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  9253 00000420 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9254                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  9255                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  9256                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9257 00000422 FB                      		sti
  9258                                  no_cmos_2:
  9259                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9260                                  		; cf=0
  9261                                  		;clc
  9262 00000423 C3                      		retn
  9263                                  
  9264                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9265                                  
  9266                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  9267                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0440h
  9268                                  %if 1 
  9269                                  
  9270                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.
  9271                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  9272                                  
  9273                                  daycnttoday:	; proc near
  9274                                  
  9275                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  9276                                  ;
  9277                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  9278                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  9279                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  9280                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  9281                                  
  9282                                  		; 08/08/2023 (ds:) (near proc)
  9283                                  		; 16/10/2022 (cs:) (far proc)		
  9284 00000424 FF36[F004]              		push	word [daycnt] ; save daycnt
  9285 00000428 813E[F004]891C          		cmp	word [daycnt], 7305 ; (365*20+(20/4))
  9286                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  9287 0000042E 7308                    		jnb	short century20
  9288                                  		;mov	byte [base_century], 19
  9289                                  		;mov	byte [base_year], 80
  9290                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9291 00000430 C706[F404]1350          		mov	word [base_century], 5013h
  9292 00000436 EB0C                    		jmp	short years
  9293                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9294                                  		
  9295                                  century20:				
  9296                                  		;mov	byte [base_century], 20
  9297                                  		;mov	byte [base_year], 0
  9298                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9299 00000438 C706[F404]1400          		mov	word [base_century], 20
  9300 0000043E 812E[F004]891C          		sub	word [daycnt], 7305 ; (365*20+(20/4))
  9301                                  					; adjust daycnt
  9302                                  years:					
  9303 00000444 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  9304 00000446 A1[F004]                		mov	ax, [daycnt]
  9305 00000449 BBB505                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  9306                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  9307 0000044C F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  9308 0000044E 8916[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  9309 00000452 B304                    		mov	bl, 4
  9310 00000454 F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  9311 00000456 0006[F504]              		add	[base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  9312 0000045A FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  9313                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9314 0000045E BB6E01                  		mov	bx, 366
  9315 00000461 B90300                  		mov	cx, 3
  9316                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 366 ; daycnt=remainder of leap year
  9317 00000464 391E[F004]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 366
  9318 00000468 7619                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  9319 0000046A FE06[F504]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  9320                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 366 ; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  9321 0000046E 291E[F004]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 366 ; 08/08/2023
  9322                                  		;mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  9323                                  regularyear:	
  9324                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9325 00000472 4B                      		dec	bx ; 365			
  9326                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 365 ; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365; i++)
  9327 00000473 391E[F004]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023
  9328 00000477 760F                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  9329 00000479 FE06[F504]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; { daycnt -=	365
  9330                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 365 ; }
  9331 0000047D 291E[F004]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023 
  9332 00000481 E2EF                    		loop	regularyear	; }
  9333                                  					;
  9334                                  					; should never fall through loop
  9335                                  leapyear:	
  9336 00000483 C606[F704]1D            		mov	byte [february], 29 ; 08/08/2023			
  9337                                  		;mov	byte [month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  9338                                  					; change month table.
  9339                                  yeardone:				
  9340 00000488 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  9341 0000048A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  9342 0000048C A1[F004]                		mov	ax, [daycnt]

  9348                                  months:

  9353                                  					; dh=0

  9358                                  					; should never fall through loop
  9359                                  month_done:

  9364 000004A8 8A36[F504]              		mov	dh, [base_year]
