 11049 00000A54 8826[2B01]              		mov	[save_eot], ah
 11050                                  
 11051                                  ; for 3.5" drives, both external as well as on the k09, we need to set the
 11052                                  ; motor start time to 4. this checking for every i/o is going to affect
 11053                                  ; performance across the board, but is necessary!!
 11054                                  
 11055 00000A58 1E                      		push	ds
 11056 00000A59 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]	; get pointer to disk base table
 11057 00000A5D 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11058                                  					; ffSmall
 11059 00000A62 7505                    		jnz	short motor_start_ok
 11060 00000A64 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 11061 00000A66 86440A                  		xchg	al, [si+10]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 11062                                  motor_start_ok:
 11063                                  
 11064                                  ; ds:si now points to disk parameter table.
 11065                                  ; get current settle and set fast settle
 11066

 11072 00000A6C 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11073                                  					; get settle and set up	for fast
 11074 00000A6F 1F                      		pop	ds
 11075 00000A70 A2[2701]                		mov	[settlecurrent], al

 11513 00000C9F C3                      		retn
 11514                                  
 11515                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11516                                  
 11517                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11518                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11519                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11520                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11521                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11522                                  
 11523                                  again:	
 11524 00000CA0 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11525 00000CA3 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11526 00000CA6 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11527                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11528 00000CA8 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11529 00000CA9 C3                      		retn
 11530                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11531                                  
 11532                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11533 00000CAA 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11534 00000CAC C3                      		retn

 11547                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 11548                                  ;
 11549                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11550                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11551                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11552                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11553                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11554                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11555                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11556                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o

 11640                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11641                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11642                                  ;
 11643                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11644                                  ;
 11645                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11646                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11647                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11648                                  ;
 11649                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11650                                  
 11651                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11652                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11653                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11654 00000CDD E88DF8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11655 00000CE0 06                      		push	es
 11656 00000CE1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11657 00000CE5 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11658                                  					; RAWIO
 11659 00000CEA 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11660 00000CEE 07                      		pop	es
 11661 00000CEF 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11662                                  
 11663                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11664                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11665                                  
 11666                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11667 00000CF1 BE[AE0C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11668                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11669                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11670 00000CF4 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11671 00000CF6 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11672                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11673 00000CF8 BE[C10C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11674                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11675                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11676                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11677 00000CFB 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11678 00000CFD 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11679 00000CFF 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11680 00000D02 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11681 00000D04 98                      		cbw
 11682 00000D05 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11683 00000D07 46                      		inc	si
 11684 00000D08 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11685 00000D0A 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11686                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11687 00000D0D 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11688                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11689                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11690 00000D12 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11691 00000D14 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11692                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11693                                  
 11694                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11695                                  		; as a fall through from above

 11709                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)

 11938                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11939                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11940                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11941                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11942                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11943                                  ;
 11944                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11945                                  ;
 11946                                  ; output:
 11947                                  ;	for status call:
 11948                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11949                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11950                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11951                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11952                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11953                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11954                                  ;
 11955                                  ;	for format track:
 11956                                  ;		carry set if error
 11957                                  ;
 11958                                  ; ==========================================================================

 12112                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12113                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12114                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12115                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12116                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12117                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12118                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be

 12227                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12228                                  
 12229                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12230                                  ;
 12231                                  ; TrackIo:
 12232                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12233                                  ;
 12234                                  ;   input:
 12235                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12236                                  ;		  3 = write
 12237                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12238                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12239                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12240                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12241                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12242                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12243                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12244                                  ;
 12245                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12246                                  
 12247                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12248                                  		
 12249                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12250                                  TrackIo:	
 12251                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12252 00000F8F 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12253 00000F93 E83FF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv

 12261 00000FA3 58                      		pop	ax

 12265 00000FA9 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1

 12267                                  
 12268                                  		; WE WANT:
 12269                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12270                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12271

 12280                                  ionextsector:

 12285                                  					; the track table

 12289                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12290                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12291                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12292                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 12293                                  		; 3). Good track layout

 12303                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 12304 00000FCD 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.

 12306 00000FD3 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 12307 00000FD5 E816FB                  		call	Disk
 12308 00000FD8 5A                      		pop	dx
 12309 00000FD9 59                      		pop	cx
 12310 00000FDA F8                      		clc
 12311 00000FDB C3                      		retn

 12313                                  
 12314                                  IoRemovable:

 12316                                  					; table	and save it

 12358                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12359                                  ;
 12360                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12361                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12362                                  ; are permissible.
 12363                                  ;
 12364                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12365                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12366                                  ; All other registers preserved
 12367                                  ;
 12368                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12369                                  
 12370                                  ; 02/09/2023
 12371                                  ;SectSizeToSectIndex:
 12372                                  ;		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 12373                                  ;					; examine upper	byte only
 12374                                  ;		ja	short OneK
 12375                                  ;		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 12376                                  ;		retn
 12377                                  
 12378                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12379                                  ;
 12380                                  ;OneK:
 12381                                  ;		mov	al, 3
 12382                                  ;		retn
 12383                                  
 12384                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12385                                  
 12386                                  ; 02/09/2023
 12387                                  ;SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize:
 12388                                  ;		mov	cl, al
 12389                                  ;		mov	ax, 128
 12390                                  ;		shl	ax, cl
 12391                                  ;		retn
 12392                                  
 12393                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12394

 12396                                  
 12397                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12398                                  ;
 12399                                  ; SetDASD
 12400                                  ;
 12401                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 12402                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 12403                                  ;
 12404                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 12405                                  ;
 12406                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12407                                  
 12408                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12409                                  SetDasd:
 12410 00001014 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12411                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12412 00001019 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12413                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12414 0000101B 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 12415                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12416                                  					; set_dasd_true
 12417 00001020 7447                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 12418                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12419 00001022 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 12420                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12421                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 12422                                  DoSetDasd:
 12423 00001027 C606[3106]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 12424 0000102C C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 12425 00001031 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 12426                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12427 00001033 268A6522                		mov	ah, [es:di+22h] ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12428 00001037 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
 12429                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12430                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 12431 0000103A 7415                    		jz	short DoSet
 12432 0000103C 80FC01                  		cmp	ah, 1
 12433                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12434                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 12435                                  		;jz	short GotBig
 12436 0000103F B001                    		mov	al, 1
 12437                                  		;jmp	short DoSet
 12438                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12439 00001041 750E                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12440                                  
 12441                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12442                                  
 12443                                  GotBig:
 12444                                  		;mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 12445                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12446 00001043 40                      		inc	ax  ; mov al, 2
 12447 00001044 803E[2F06]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 12448 00001049 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12449                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 12450                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12451                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 12452                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12453 0000104B 40                      		inc	ax  ; al = 3
 12454 0000104C C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h
 12455                                  DoSet:
 12456 00001051 1E                      		push	ds
 12457 00001052 56                      		push	si
 12458                                  
 12459                                  		;mov	ds, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vectors
 12460                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12461 00001053 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12462 00001055 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si	; 0
 12463                                  
 12464 00001057 C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 12465                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 12466                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h
 12467                                  
 12468 0000105B C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 12469                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12470 0000105F 5E                      		pop	si
 12471 00001060 1F                      		pop	ds
 12472 00001061 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 12473 00001063 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 12474 00001067 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12475                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12476                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 12477 00001069 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12478 0000106D 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 12479 00001071 C3                      		retn
 12480                                  
 12481                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12482                                  
 12483                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12484                                  
 12485                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12486                                  ;
 12487                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12488                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12489                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12490                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12491                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12492                                  ;
 12493                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12494                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12495                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12496                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12497                                  ;
 12498                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12499                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12500                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12501                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12502                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12503                                  ;
 12504                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12505                                  
 12506                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12507                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12508 00001072 51                      		push	cx
 12509 00001073 52                      		push	dx
 12510                                  
 12511                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12512                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12513                                  
 12514 00001074 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12515 00001079 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12516 0000107B 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12517 0000107D 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12518 00001082 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12519 00001084 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12520                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12521                                  
 12522                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12523 00001086 06                      		push	es
 12524 00001087 56                      		push	si
 12525                                  		
 12526                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12527                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12528 00001088 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12529 0000108A 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12530                                  
 12531 0000108C 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12532                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12533                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12534 00001091 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12535 00001095 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12536                                  
 12537                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12538                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12539                                  
 12540 00001099 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12541 0000109E 5E                      		pop	si
 12542 0000109F 07                      		pop	es
 12543                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 12544 000010A0 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12545 000010A4 49                      		dec	cx
 12546 000010A5 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12547 000010A8 D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12548 000010AA D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12549 000010AC 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12550 000010AE 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12551 000010B2 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12552 000010B6 06                      		push	es
 12553 000010B7 1E                      		push	ds
 12554 000010B8 56                      		push	si
 12555 000010B9 57                      		push	di
 12556 000010BA B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12557 000010BC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12558                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12559 000010BE 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12560 000010C0 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12561 000010C5 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12562 000010C7 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12563                                  
 12564                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12565                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12566 000010C8 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12567 000010CA 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 12568 000010CC 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12569                                  
 12570 000010CD 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12571                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12572                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12573 000010D2 8936[3206]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12574 000010D6 8C06[3406]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12575                                  
 12576                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12577                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12578                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 12579                                  		;mov	es, si
 12580 000010DA 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12581                                  
 12582                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12583 000010DB 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12584                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12585 000010E0 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12586 000010E5 C606[3006]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12587                                  skip_disk_base_setting:
 12588 000010EA 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 12589                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 12590 000010EC A2[3106]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 12591 000010EF EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 12592                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12593                                  
 12594                                  FormaStatErr:
 12595                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12596 000010F1 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 12597                                  				
 12598 000010F3 80FC0C                  		cmp	ah, 0Ch		; DSK_ILLEGAL_COMBINATION
 12599                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 12600 000010F6 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 12601 000010F8 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 12602 000010FB 7402                    		jz	short FormatStatTimeOut
 12603                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12604                                  		;dec	al
 12605                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12606 000010FD 48                      		dec	ax
 12607                                  		; al = 2
 12608                                  		;mov	al, 1		; Function not supported.
 12609                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12610                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12611                                  
 12612                                  FormatStatIllegalComb:
 12613                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12614                                  		;dec	al	; 3 -> 2 or 2 -> 1
 12615                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12616 000010FE 48                      		dec	ax
 12617                                  		; al = 2				
 12618                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 12619                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 12620                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12621                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12622                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12623                                  
 12624                                  FormatStatTimeOut:
 12625                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12626                                  		; al = 3
 12627                                  		;mov	al, 3		; Function supported, but
 12628                                  					; Media	not present.
 12629                                  PopStatRet:
 12630 000010FF 5F                      		pop	di
 12631 00001100 5E                      		pop	si
 12632 00001101 1F                      		pop	ds
 12633 00001102 07                      		pop	es
 12634                                  SetMediaRet:
 12635 00001103 5A                      		pop	dx
 12636 00001104 59                      		pop	cx
 12637 00001105 C3                      		retn
 12638                                  
 12639                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12640                                  
 12641                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12642                                  
 12643                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12644                                  ;
 12645                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12646                                  ;
 12647                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12648                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12649                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12650                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12651                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12652                                  ;
 12653                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12654                                  
 12655                                  ResetDisk:
 12656 00001106 50                      		push	ax
 12657                                  
 12658                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12659 00001107 B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 12660 0000110A 3806[3006]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 12661                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12662                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12663 0000110E 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12664                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12665                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12666 00001110 A2[3106]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 12667                                  ResetDisk_cont:
 12668                                  		; 02/09/2023 (ah=0)
 12669                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12670 00001113 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12671                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12672 00001115 C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12673                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12674 0000111A 58                      		pop	ax
 12675 0000111B C3                      		retn
 12676                                  
 12677                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12678                                  
 12679                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12680                                  
 12681                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12682                                  ;
 12683                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12684                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12685                                  ;
 12686                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12687                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12688                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12689                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12690                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12691                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12692                                  ;
 12693                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12694                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12695                                  ;
 12696                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12697                                  
 12698                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12699                                  ToRom:	
 12700 0000111C 53                      		push	bx
 12701 0000111D 56                      		push	si
 12702                                  
 12703                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12704                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12705                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12706                                  
 12707 0000111E F606[3006]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12708 00001123 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12709 00001125 50                      		push	ax
 12710 00001126 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12711 00001127 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12712                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 12713 0000112C 9C                      		pushf			; (Save	the cmp	result)
 12714 0000112D 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12715                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 12716 00001131 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12717                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12718                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12719 00001136 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12720 0000113A 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12721                                  		
 12722 0000113E A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12723 00001141 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12724 00001145 A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 12725 00001148 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 12726                                  					; Important for	format
 12727 0000114C 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12728                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12729                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12730 00001151 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12731 00001152 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12732 00001154 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12733                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12734 00001159 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12735 0000115A 58                      		pop	ax
 12736                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12737 0000115B 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12738 0000115F 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12739 00001161 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12740 00001165 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 12741 00001169 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12742 0000116A 8E06[2F05]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12743 0000116E CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12744 00001170 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12745 00001171 5E                      		pop	si
 12746 00001172 5B                      		pop	bx
 12747 00001173 C3                      		retn
 12748                                  
 12749                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12750                                  
 12751                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12752                                  
 12753                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12754                                  
 12755                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12756                                  ;
 12757                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12758                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12759                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12760                                  ;
 12761                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12762                                  
 12763                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12764                                  ioctl_getown:
 12765 00001174 E8F6F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12766 00001177 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12767                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12768 0000117B C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12769                                  ownloop:				
 12770 0000117F 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12771 00001183 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12772                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12773 00001185 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12774                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12775                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12776 0000118A 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 12777                                  getnextBDS:				
 12778 0000118C 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12779 0000118F EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12780                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12781                                  
 12782                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12783                                  ;
 12784                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12785                                  ; in al to al.
 12786                                  ;
 12787                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12788                                  
 12789                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12790                                  ioctl_setown:
 12791 00001191 E8D9F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12792 00001194 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12793                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12794 00001199 E839F7                  		call	checksingle
 12795                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12796 0000119C FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 12797                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12798                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12799                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12800                                  
 12801                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12802                                  ;
 12803                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12804                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12805                                  ;
 12806                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12807                                  
 12808                                  exitown:				
 12809 000011A0 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12810                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12811 000011A2 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12812                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12813                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12814 000011A7 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12815 000011A9 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12816                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12817                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12818 000011AD FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12819                                  exitnomult:				
 12820 000011AF C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12821 000011B3 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12822                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12823                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12824                                  		; cf=0
 12825                                  		;clc
