 12878                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12879                                  
 12880                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12881                                  ;	get media id
 12882                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12883                                  ;
 12884                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12885                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12886                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12887                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12888                                  ;
 12889                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12890                                  ;
 12891                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12892                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12893                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12894                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12895                                  ;
 12896                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12897                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12898                                  ;
 12899                                  ; LOGIC:
 12900                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12901                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12902                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12903                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12904                                  ;
 12905                                  ; {
 12906                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12907                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12908                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12909                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12910                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12911                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12912                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12913                                  ;		};
 12914                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12915                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12916                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12917                                  ;		};
 12918                                  ;	else
 12919                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12920                                  ;
 12921                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12922                                  
 12923                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12924                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12925                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12926                                  
 12927                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12928                                  GetMediaId:
 12929 000011E5 E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12930 000011E8 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12931 000011EC C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12932 000011F1 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12933 000011F4 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12934                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12935 000011F6 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12936                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12937 000011FB 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12938                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12939 000011FD BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12940 00001200 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12941                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12942                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12943 00001203 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12944 00001205 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12945 00001209 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12946                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12947 0000120D 46                      		inc	si
 12948                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12949                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12950 0000120E 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12951 00001211 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12952                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12953                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12954 00001214 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12955                                  	
 12956                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12957                                  		; cf = 0
 12958                                  		;clc
 12959                                  
 12960 00001216 C3                      		retn
 12961                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12962                                  
 12963                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12964 00001217 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12965 00001219 F9                      		stc
 12966                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12967 0000121A C3                      		retn
 12968                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12969                                  
 12970                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12971                                  
 12972                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12973                                  ;  set media id
 12974                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12975                                  
 12976                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12977                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12978                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12979                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12980                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12981                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12982                                  ;
 12983                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12984                                  ;
 12985                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12986                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12987                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12988                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12989                                  ;
 12990                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12991                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12992                                  ;
 12993                                  ; logic:
 12994                                  ;
 12995                                  ; {
 12996                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12997                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12998                                  ;	BootIo;
 12999                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13000                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13001                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13002                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13003                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13004                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13005                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13006                                  ;		};
 13007                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13008                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13009                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13010                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13011                                  ;		};
 13012                                  ;	else
 13013                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13014                                  ;
 13015                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13016                                  
 13017                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13018                                  SetMediaId:
 13019 0000121B E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13020 0000121E 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13021                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13022 00001222 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13023 00001224 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13024 00001229 52                      		push	dx
 13025 0000122A E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13026 0000122D 5A                      		pop	dx
 13027 0000122E 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13028                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13029 00001230 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13030                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13031 00001235 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13032 00001237 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13033                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13034 0000123C 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13035 0000123E 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13036 0000123F 57                      		push	di
 13037 00001240 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13038 00001241 07                      		pop	es
 13039 00001242 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13040 00001245 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13041 00001249 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13042 0000124C 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13043 0000124F B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13044                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13045                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13046 00001252 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 13047 00001254 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 13048 00001255 1F                      		pop	ds
 13049 00001256 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 13050 00001257 07                      		pop	es
 13051 00001258 E876F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 13052 0000125B 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13053 0000125D C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 13054 00001262 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 13055 00001265 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 13056                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 13057                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 13058 0000126A C3                      		retn
 13059                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13060                                  
 13061                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 13062 0000126B B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13063 0000126D F9                      		stc
 13064                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 13065 0000126E C3                      		retn
 13066                                  
 13067                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13068                                  
 13069                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13070                                  
 13071                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13072                                  ;	BootIo
 13073                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13074                                  ;
 13075                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13076                                  ;
 13077                                  ; input :
 13078                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13079                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13080                                  ;
 13081                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13082                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13083                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13084                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13085                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13086                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13087                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13088                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13089                                  ;
 13090                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13091                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13092                                  ;
 13093                                  ; logic:
 13094                                  ;
 13095                                  ; {
 13096                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13097                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13098                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13099                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13100                                  ; }
 13101                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13102                                  
 13103                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13104                                  BootIo:	
 13105 0000126F 06                      		push	es
 13106 00001270 57                      		push	di
 13107 00001271 53                      		push	bx
 13108 00001272 1E                      		push	ds
 13109 00001273 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13110                                  
 13111                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13112                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13113                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13114                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13115                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13116                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13117                                  
 13118 00001274 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13119 00001277 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13120 00001279 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13121 0000127D B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13122 00001280 E8E0F6                  		call	diskio
 13123 00001283 5B                      		pop	bx
 13124 00001284 5F                      		pop	di
 13125 00001285 07                      		pop	es
 13126 00001286 C3                      		retn
 13127                                  
 13128                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13129                                  
 13130                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13131                                  
 13132                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13133                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13134                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13135                                  ;
 13136                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13137                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13138                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13139                                  ; history in the flags.
 13140                                  ;
 13141                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13142                                  ;
 13143                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13144                                  ;
 13145                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13146                                  ;
 13147                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13148                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13149                                  ;
 13150                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13151                                  
 13152                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13153 00001287 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13154 0000128B 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13155 0000128D 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13156                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13157 0000128F 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13158                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13159                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13160 00001294 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13161 00001296 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13162 0000129B 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13163 0000129D E8EB06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13164 000012A0 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13165                                  
 13166                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13167                                  
 13168 000012A2 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13169 000012A4 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13170                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13171                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13172 000012A6 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13173 000012A8 53                      		push	bx
 13174 000012A9 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13175                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13176                                  					; physical drive
 13177 000012AC E8B506                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13178 000012AF 5B                      		pop	bx
 13179                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13180 000012B0 C3                      		retn
 13181                                  
 13182                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13183                                  
 13184                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13185                                  
 13186                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13187                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13188                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13189                                  ;
 13190                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13191                                  ;
 13192                                  ; INPUT :
 13193                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13194                                  ;
 13195                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13196                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13197                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13198                                  
 13199                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13200                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 13201 000012B1 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13202 000012B5 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13203                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13204                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13205 000012B8 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13206                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13207 000012BA 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13208                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13209                                  					; unformatted_media
 13210 000012BF 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13211 000012C1 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13212                                  
 13213                                  GafDone:				
 13214 000012C3 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13215 000012C6 C3                      		retn
 13216                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13217                                  
 13218                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13219                                  
 13220                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13221                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13222                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13223                                  ;
 13224                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13225                                  ;
 13226                                  ; input :
 13227                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13228                                  ;
 13229                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13230                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13231                                  
 13232                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13233                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13234 000012C7 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13235 000012CB C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13236                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13237 000012CE 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13238                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13239                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13240 000012D3 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13241 000012D7 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13242                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13243 000012D9 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13244                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13245                                  					; unformatted_media
 13246                                  saf_Done:				
 13247 000012DE C3                      		retn
 13248                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13249                                  
 13250                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13251                                  
 13252                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13253                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13254                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13255                                  ;
 13256                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13257                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13258                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13259                                  ;
 13260                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13261                                  
 13262                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13263                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13264 000012DF 06                      		push	es
 13265 000012E0 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13266 000012E4 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13267                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13268                                  
 13269                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13270                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 13271                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 13272                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 13273                                  
 13274 000012E8 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13275                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13276 000012EA 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13277                                  ioctl_support:
 13278 000012EC 0E                      		push	cs
 13279 000012ED 07                      		pop	es
 13280                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13281                                  		;mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13282 000012EE B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13283                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13284 000012F1 BF[D20C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13285                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13286                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13287 000012F4 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13288 000012F6 F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13289 000012F8 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13290 000012FA B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 13291                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13292                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 13293                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 13294                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13295                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 13296                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13297                                  ioctlsupexit:
 13298 000012FD 07                      		pop	es
 13299                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13300                                  		; cf = 0
 13301                                  		;clc
 13302 000012FE C3                      		retn
 13303                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13304                                  nosupport:
 13305 000012FF 07                      		pop	es
 13306 00001300 E9D2ED                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 13307                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13308                                  
 13309                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13310                                  
 13311                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13312                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 13313                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13314                                  ;
 13315                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 13316                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 13317                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 13318                                  ;	    drive)
 13319                                  ;
 13320                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 13321                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 13322                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 13323                                  ;
 13324                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 13325                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 13326                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 13327                                  ;
 13328                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 13329                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 13330                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13331                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13332                                  ;
 13333                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 13334                                  ;
 13335                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 13336                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 13337                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 13338                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 13339                                  ; 
 13340                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13341                                  
 13342                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13343                                  SenseMediaType:				
 13344 00001303 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 13345 00001307 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13346                                  		; 10/10/2022
 13347                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 13348 0000130A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13349 0000130C 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 13350                                  		;
 13351 0000130E 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13352                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 13353                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13354                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 13355 00001312 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 13356                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 13357 00001314 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 13358 00001316 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 13359 00001318 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 13360                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 13361 0000131A FEC8                    		dec	al
 13362 0000131C 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 13363 0000131E 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13364 00001320 0404                    		add	al, 4
 13365 00001322 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 13366 00001324 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13367 00001326 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 13368 00001328 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 13369                                  GotMediaType:				
 13370 0000132A 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 13371                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13372                                  		; cf = 0
 13373                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 13374 0000132D C3                      		retn
 13375                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13376                                  
 13377                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 13378 0000132E 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 13379 00001331 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 13380 00001333 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 13381 00001335 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 13382 00001338 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 13383                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 13384 0000133A B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 13385                                  SenseErrExit:				
 13386 0000133C B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 13387 0000133E F9                      		stc
 13388 0000133F C3                      		retn
 13389                                  
 13390                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13391                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13392                                  		;db    0
 13393                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13394                                  
 13395                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13396                                  
 13397                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13398                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13399                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13400                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13401                                  
 13402                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 13403                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 13404                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 13405                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 13406                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 13407                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 13408                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 13409                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 13410                                  ;
 13411                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 13412                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 13413                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 13414                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 13415                                  ;
 13416                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 13417                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 13418                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 13419                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 13420                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 13421                                  ;
 13422                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 13423                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 13424                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 13425                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 13426                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 13427                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 13428                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 13429                                  
 13430                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 13431                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 13432                                  
 13433                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13434                                  
 13435                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 13436 00001340 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 13437 00001343 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 13438 00001345 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 13439 00001348 7431                    		jz	short mine
 13440                                  
 13441                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 13442                                  
 13443 0000134A 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 13444 0000134D 746C                    		jz	short win386call
 13445 0000134F 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 13446 00001352 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 13447 00001354 E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 13448                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13449                                  
 13450                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 13451 00001357 CF                      		iret
 13452                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13453                                  
 13454                                  int2f_replace_int13:
 13455 00001358 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 13456 00001359 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 13457                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 13458                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 13459                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 13460 0000135B 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 13461                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13462                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 13463                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 13464                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 13465                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 13466                                  		
 13467                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13468                                  		;push	word [Orig13]
 13469 00001360 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 13470                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 13471 00001364 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 13472                                  
 13473                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 13474                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 13475                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 13476                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 13477                                  		
 13478                                  		;mov	[Orig13], dx
 13479                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13480 00001368 8716[B400]              		xchg	dx, [Orig13]
 13481 0000136C A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 13482                                  		;mov	[Old13], bx
 13483                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13484 0000136F 871E[0601]              		xchg	bx, [Old13]
 13485 00001373 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 13486                                  
 13487 00001377 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 13488                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13489                                  		;pop	bx
 13490 00001378 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 13491                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 13492 00001379 58                      		pop	ax
 13493                                  i2f_iret:
 13494 0000137A CF                      		iret
 13495                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13496                                  
 13497                                  mine:
 13498 0000137B 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 13499 0000137D 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 13500 0000137F 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 13501 00001381 7503                    		jnz	short disp_func
 13502 00001383 B0FF                    		mov	al, 0FFh

 13515

 13519                                  					; = [0070h:25A0h] = [02C7h:0030h]

 13526                                  		;jmp	far ptr	i2f_dskentry

 13532                                  		; 20/09/2023
 13533                                  		;jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:i2f_dskentry ; 70h:i2f_dskentry
 13534                                  					; NOTE: jump to a FAR function, not an
 13535                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 13536                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 13537                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf
 13538

 13540                                  
 13541                                  do_subfun_01:
 13542 000013A2 06                      		push	es

 13549                                  					; point	ds: -> Bios_Data

 13561                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13562 000013B6 C53E[1901]              		lds	di, [start_bds]
 13563                                  		;lds	di, ds:start_bds
 13564                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
 13565                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13566                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13567 000013BA CF                      		iret
 13568                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13569                                  
 13570                                  ; 17/10/2022
 13571                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13572                                  
 13573                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 13574                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 13575                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 13576                                  
 13577                                  win386call:				
 13578 000013BB 1E                      		push	ds
 13579 000013BC 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13580                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13581                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 13582 000013C1 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 13583                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 13584 000013C3 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 13585 000013C5 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 13586                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 13587 000013C7 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 13588                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13589 000013C9 F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 13590                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13591 000013CC 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 13592                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 13593 000013CE 8026[6F08]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 13594 000013D3 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret
 13595                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13596                                  
 13597                                  Win386Init:
 13598                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13599 000013D5 F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 13600                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13601 000013D8 7512                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 13602                                  		;or	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Indicate WIN386 present
 13603 000013DA 800E[6F08]01            		or	byte [IsWin386], 1
 13604                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next, bx	; Hook our structure into chain
 13605                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es
 13606 000013DF 891E[3D08]              		mov	[SI_Next], bx
 13607 000013E3 8C06[3F08]              		mov	[SI_Next+2], es
 13608                                  		;mov	bx, offset Win386_SI ; point ES:BX to Win386_SI
 13609 000013E7 BB[3B08]                		mov	bx, Win386_SI	; 19/10/2022
 13610 000013EA 1E                      		push	ds
 13611 000013EB 07                      		pop	es
 13612                                  win_iret:
 13613 000013EC 1F                      		pop	ds
 13614                                  ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
 13615                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret	; return back up the chain
 13616                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13617 000013ED CF                      		iret
 13618                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13619                                  
 13620                                  handle_multmult:
 13621 000013EE 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 13622 000013F0 7514                    		jnz	short try_2
 13623 000013F2 1E                      		push	ds
 13624 000013F3 E84500                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13625                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13626                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 13627                                  		;dec	bx
 13628 000013F6 BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 13629 000013F9 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 13630 000013FB 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 13631 000013FD F7D3                    		not	bx
 13632 000013FF 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 13633 00001401 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 13634 00001403 43                      		inc	bx
 13635                                  try_1:
 13636 00001404 1F                      		pop	ds
 13637                                  		;jmp	short ii2f_iret
 13638                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13639 00001405 CF                      		iret
 13640                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13641                                  
 13642                                  try_2:
 13643 00001406 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; multMULTALLOCHMA
 13644 00001408 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
 13645 0000140A 1E                      		push	ds
 13646                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13647                                  		;xor	di, di
 13648                                  		;dec	di
 13649 0000140B BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh	; assume not enough space
 13650 0000140E 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
 13651 00001410 E82800                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13652 00001413 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 13653 00001416 7421                    		jz	short InsuffHMA
 13654 00001418 F7DF                    		neg	di		; free space in HMA
 13655 0000141A 39FB                    		cmp	bx, di
 13656 0000141C 7605                    		jbe	short try_4
 13657                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13658                                  		;sub	di, di
 13659                                  		;dec	di
 13660 0000141E BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh
 13661                                  		;jmp	short InsuffHMA
 13662                                  		; 02/09/2023

 13665                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13666
