 14739                                  
 14740                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14741                                  
 14742                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14743                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14744                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14745                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14746                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14747                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14748                                  
 14749                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14750 000017F1 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14751 000017F3 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14751 000017FC 736B6574746520666F-
 14751 00001805 7220647269766520   
 14752                                  
 14753                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14754 0000180D 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14754 00001816 65737320616E79206B-
 14754 0000181F 6579207768656E2072-
 14754 00001828 656164790D0A       
 14755 0000182E 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14756                                  
 14757                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14758                                  
 14759                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14760                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14761                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14762                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14763                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14764                                  
 14765                                  chkopcnt:		
 14766 00001830 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14767 00001835 C3                      		retn
 14768                                  
 14769                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14770                                  
 14771                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14772                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14773                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14774                                  ;
 14775                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14776                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14777                                  
 14778                                  mediacheck:	
 14779 00001836 E89CF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14780 00001839 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14781 0000183B E84D01                  		call	haschange
 14782 0000183E 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14783 00001840 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 14784 00001843 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14785 00001845 50                      		push	ax
 14786 00001846 52                      		push	dx
 14787 00001847 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14788                                  					; set logical drive number
 14789 0000184B B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14790 0000184D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14791                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14792                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14793 0000184F 5A                      		pop	dx
 14794 00001850 58                      		pop	ax
 14795 00001851 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14796 00001853 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14797                                  
 14798                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14799                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14800                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14801                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14802                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14803                                  ; status.
 14804                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14805 00001856 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14806 0000185A 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14807                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14808                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14809                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14810                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14811 0000185E 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14812                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14813                                  
 14814                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14815                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14816                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14817                                  
 14818 00001860 50                      		push	ax
 14819 00001861 51                      		push	cx
 14820 00001862 52                      		push	dx
 14821 00001863 E88DED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14822 00001866 5A                      		pop	dx
 14823 00001867 59                      		pop	cx
 14824 00001868 58                      		pop	ax
 14825 00001869 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14826 0000186B 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14827                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14828 0000186D 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14829                                  mediaret:				
 14830 0000186F C3                      		retn
 14831                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14832                                  
 14833                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14834                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14835                                  ; or write.
 14836                                  
 14837                                  mediadovolid:				
 14838 00001870 E820EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14839 00001873 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14840 00001875 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14841 00001878 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14842 0000187A E9EBF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14843                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14844                                  
 14845                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14846                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14847                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14848                                  ; dos.
 14849                                  ;
 14850                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14851                                  
 14852                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14853                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14854                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14855                                  
 14856                                  checklatchio:	
 14857                                  
 14858                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14859                                  			
 14860 0000187D E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14861 00001880 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14862                                  
 14863                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14864                                  
 14865 00001882 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 14866 00001885 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14867                                  
 14868                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14869                                  ; expensive verification.
 14870                                  
 14871 00001887 E809EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14872 0000188A 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14873 0000188C E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14874 0000188F 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14875 00001891 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14876 00001893 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14877 00001895 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 14878                                  checklatchret:				
 14879 00001898 E8CDF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14880                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14881 0000189B F9                      		stc
 14882 0000189C 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14883                                  checkret:				
 14884 0000189D C3                      		retn
 14885                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14886                                  
 14887                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14888                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14889                                  ;
 14890                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14891                                  
 14892                                  checkfatvid:				
 14893 0000189E E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14894 000018A1 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14895 000018A3 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14896                                  
 14897                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14898                                  
 14899                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14900                                  
 14901                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14902                                  
 14903                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14904                                  ;
 14905                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14906                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14907                                  ;
 14908                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14909                                  ;
 14910                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14911                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14912                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14913                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14914                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14915                                  ;
 14916                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14917                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14918                                  ; routine.)
 14919                                  ;
 14920                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14921                                  
 14922                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14923                                  check_vid:
 14924                                  
 14925                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14926                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14927                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14928                                  
 14929 000018A5 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14930                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14931                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14932 000018AA 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14933 000018AC E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 14934 000018AF 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14935 000018B1 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14936 000018B3 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14937                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14938 000018B8 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14939                                  					; if not fat system
 14940 000018BA E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 14941 000018BD 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14942 000018BF E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 14943 000018C2 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14944                                  					; definitely changed
 14945 000018C5 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14946                                  
 14947 000018C7 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14948                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14949 000018C8 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 14950                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14951                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14952                                  		;clc
 14953                                  checkfatret:				
 14954 000018CB C3                      		retn
 14955                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14956                                  
 14957                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14958                                  changed_drv:
 14959 000018CC F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14960 000018CD C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14961                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14962 000018D2 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14963                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14964                                  
 14965                                  ; extended id check
 14966                                  
 14967                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14968                                  
 14969                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14970                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14971                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14972                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14973                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14974                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14975                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14976                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14977                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14978                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14979                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14980                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14981                                  ;
 14982                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14983                                  
 14984                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14985                                  do_ext_check_id:
 14986 000018D3 50                      		push	ax
 14987                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14988                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14989 000018D4 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14990                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14991 000018D7 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 14992 000018D9 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14993 000018DD 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14994 000018DF A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14995 000018E2 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14996 000018E6 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14997                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 14998                                  					; don't know
 14999 000018E8 58                      		pop	ax
 15000 000018E9 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15001                                  					; reset the flag
 15002                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15003                                  
 15004                                  ext_changed:
 15005 000018EB 58                      		pop	ax
 15006                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15007 000018EC 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15008                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15009                                  					; disk changed!
 15010                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15011                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15012                                  		;clc
 15013 000018ED EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15014                                  
 15015                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15016                                  
 15017                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15018                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15019                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15020                                  ;
 15021                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15022                                  
 15023                                  checkio:				
 15024 000018EF 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15025 000018F2 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15026 000018F4 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15027 000018F7 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15028 000018F9 E897ED                  		call	GetBp
 15029 000018FC 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15030 000018FE E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15031 00001901 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15032 00001903 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15033 00001905 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15034 00001907 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15035 00001908 C3                      		retn
 15036                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15037                                  
 15038                                  checkioerr:				
 15039 00001909 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15040                                  
 15041                                  checkioret:				
 15042 0000190C F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15043 0000190D E908F3                  		jmp	harderr
 15044                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15045                                  
 15046                                  no_error_map:				
 15047 00001910 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15048                                  
 15049                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15050                                  
 15051                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15052                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15053                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15054                                  
 15055                                  returnvid:		
 15056 00001913 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15057                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15058 00001916 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15059 00001919 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15060 0000191B F9                      		stc
 15061 0000191C C3                      		retn
 15062                                  
 15063                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15064                                  
 15065                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15066                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15067                                  ;
 15068                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15069                                  ; **trashes si**
 15070                                  
 15071                                  media_set_vid:				
 15072 0000191D BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15073                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15074                                  
 15075                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15076                                  
 15077                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15078                                  
 15079                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15080                                  
 15081                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15082                                  vid_into_packet:
 15083 00001920 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15084 00001921 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15085 00001925 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15086 00001928 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15087 0000192A 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15088 0000192D 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15089 00001930 1F                      		pop	ds
 15090                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15091 00001931 C3                      		retn
 15092                                  
 15093                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15094                                  
 15095                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15096                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15097                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15098                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15099                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15100                                  ;
 15101                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15102                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15103                                  ;
 15104                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15105                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15106                                  ;		carry set
 15107                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15108                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15109                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15110                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15111                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15112                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15113                                  ;
 15114                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15115                                  
 15116                                  hidensity:
 15117                                  
 15118                                  ; check for correct drive
 15119                                  		
 15120                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15121 00001932 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15122                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15123                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15124 00001937 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15125                                  
 15126                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15127                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15128                                  
 15129 00001939 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15130 0000193E 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15131                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15132                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15133 00001940 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15134 00001943 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15135                                  
 15136                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15137                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15138                                  
 15139                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15140 00001945 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15141 00001949 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15142                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15143                                  					; ffOther
 15144 0000194B 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15145 0000194D 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15146                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15147                                  					; ff288
 15148 0000194F 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15149 00001951 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15150 00001953 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15151                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15152                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15153 00001956 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15154                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15155                                  					; 2 sides
 15156                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15157 00001959 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15158 0000195A BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15159                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15160                                  					; & head max
 15161                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15162 0000195D E9A5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15163                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15164                                  
 15165                                  Is720K:
 15166                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15167 00001960 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15168                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15169 00001961 E968ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15170                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15171                                  
 15172                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15173                                  ;dofloppy:
 15174                                  		;retn
 15175                                  
 15176                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15177                                  
 15178                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15179                                  
 15180                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15181                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15182                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15183                                  ;
 15184                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15185                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15186                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15187                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15188                                  ;
 15189                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15190                                  ;
 15191                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15192                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15193                                  
 15194                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15195 00001964 06                      		push	es
 15196 00001965 57                      		push	di
 15197                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15198                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15199 00001966 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15200                                  
 15201                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15202                                  
 15203                                  scan_bds:				
 15204 0000196A 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15205 0000196E 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15206                                  
 15207                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15208                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15209                                  
 15210 00001970 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15211                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15212                                  get_next_bds:				
 15213 00001974 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15214                                  					; go to	next bds
 15215 00001977 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15216 0000197A 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15217 0000197C 5F                      		pop	di
 15218 0000197D 07                      		pop	es
 15219 0000197E C3                      		retn
 15220                                  
 15221                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15222                                  
 15223                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15224                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15225                                  ;
 15226                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15227                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15228                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15229                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15230                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15231                                  
 15232                                  checkromchange:	
 15233                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15234                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15235 0000197F 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15236                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15237                                  					; fchanged
 15238 00001984 C3                      		retn
 15239                                  
 15240                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15241                                  
 15242                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15243                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15244                                  ;
 15245                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15246                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15247                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15248                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15249                                  
 15250                                  resetchanged:	
 15251                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15252                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15253 00001985 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15254                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15255                                  					; ~fchanged
 15256 0000198A C3                      		retn
 15257                                  
 15258                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15259                                  
 15260                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15261                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15262                                  ;
 15263                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15264                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15265                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15266                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15267                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15268                                  
 15269                                  haschange:
 15270                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15271                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15272 0000198B 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15273                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15274                                  					; fchangeline
 15275 00001990 C3                      		retn
 15276                                  
 15277                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15278                                  
 15279                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15280                                  
 15281                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15282                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15283                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15284                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15285                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15286                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15287                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15288                                  
 15289                                  ; set_volume_id
 15290                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15291                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15292                                  ;
 15293                                  ;   on entry:
 15294                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15295                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15296                                  ;
 15297                                  ;   on exit:
 15298                                  ;	carry clear:
 15299                                  ;	   successful call
 15300                                  ;	carry set
 15301                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15302                                  
 15303                                  set_volume_id:				
 15304 00001991 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15305 00001992 50                      		push	ax
 15306 00001993 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15307 00001996 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15308 00001998 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15309 0000199B 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15310 0000199D E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15311 000019A0 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15312                                  setvret:				
 15313                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15314                                  		; cf = 0
 15315                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15316 000019A3 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15317 000019A4 5A                      		pop	dx
 15318 000019A5 C3                      		retn
 15319                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15320                                  
 15321                                  seterr:					
 15322 000019A6 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15323 000019A7 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15324 000019A8 C3                      		retn
 15325                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15326 000019A9 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15327                                  
 15328                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15329                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15330                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15331                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15332                                  
 15333                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15334                                  
 15335                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15336                                  
 15337                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15338                                  ;
 15339                                  ;   on entry:
 15340                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15341                                  ;
 15342                                  ;   on exit:
 15343                                  ;	carry clear
 15344                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15345                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15346                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15347                                  ;
 15348                                  ;	carry set:
 15349                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15350                                  
 15351                                  read_volume_id:
 15352 000019AB 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15353 000019AC 51                      		push	cx
 15354 000019AD 53                      		push	bx
 15355 000019AE 50                      		push	ax
 15356 000019AF 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15357 000019B0 57                      		push	di
 15358 000019B1 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15359 000019B2 07                      		pop	es
 15360 000019B3 BF[AA08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15361 000019B6 BE[9E08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15362                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 15363 000019B9 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15364 000019BC F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15365 000019BE 5F                      		pop	di
 15366 000019BF 07                      		pop	es
 15367 000019C0 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15368                                  					; # of fats
 15369 000019C4 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15370                                  					; sectors / fat
 15371 000019C8 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15372 000019CA 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15373                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15374                                  					;
 15375                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15376                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15377 000019CE 2EA3[A919]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15378                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15379                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15380 000019D2 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15381                                  					; # root dir entries
 15382 000019D6 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15383 000019D8 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15384                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15385                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15386 000019DA 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15387                                  next_sec:
 15388 000019DB 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15389 000019DC 2EA1[A919]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15390                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15391                                  					; get sector #
 15392 000019E0 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15393                                  					; sectors / track
 15394 000019E4 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15395 000019E6 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15396                                  
 15397                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15398                                  
 15399 000019E8 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15400                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15401 000019E9 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15402 000019EB 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15403 000019ED 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15404                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15405 000019F1 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15406 000019F3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15407 000019F5 E81BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15408                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15409 000019F8 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15410 000019FA B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15411 000019FD B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15412                                  fvid_loop:
 15413                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15414 000019FF 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 15415                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15416 00001A01 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15417 00001A03 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15418 00001A06 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15419 00001A08 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15420 00001A0B 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15421                                  ent_loop:
 15422 00001A0D 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15423 00001A10 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15424 00001A12 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15425 00001A13 2EFF06[A919]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15426                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15427                                  					; next sector
 15428 00001A18 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15429                                  notfound:
 15430                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15431                                  		;xor	si, si
 15432 00001A1A EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15433                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15434                                  
 15435                                  found_vid:
 15436                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15437                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 15438 00001A1C 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15439 00001A1D 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15440 00001A1F 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15441 00001A20 57                      		push	di
 15442 00001A21 1E                      		push	ds
 15443 00001A22 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15444 00001A23 BF[AA08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15445 00001A26 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15446                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15447 00001A29 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15448                                  		;xor	al, al
 15449                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15450 00001A2B 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15451 00001A2C AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15452                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15453                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15454                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15455 00001A2D 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15456 00001A2E 07                      		pop	es
 15457                                  fvid_ret:
 15458                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15459 00001A2F 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15460                                  				
 15461 00001A31 58                      		pop	ax
 15462                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15463                                  		; cf = 0
 15464                                  		;clc
 15465                                  rvidret:
 15466 00001A32 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15467 00001A33 59                      		pop	cx
 15468 00001A34 5A                      		pop	dx
 15469 00001A35 C3                      		retn
 15470                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15471                                  
 15472                                  no_vid:
 15473 00001A36 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15474                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15475                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15476 00001A37 EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15477                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15478                                  
 15479                                  readviderr:
 15480 00001A39 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15481 00001A3A 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15482 00001A3B EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15483                                  
 15484                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15485                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15486                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15487                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15488 00001A3D BE[AA08]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15489                                  		;
 15490                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15491                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15492                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15493                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15494 00001A40 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15495 00001A43 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15496                                  		;
 15497 00001A46 FC                      		cld
 15498 00001A47 C3                      		retn
 15499                                  
 15500                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15501                                  
 15502                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15503                                  ;
 15504                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15505                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15506                                  
 15507                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15508 00001A48 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15509 00001A49 56                      		push	si
 15510 00001A4A 51                      		push	cx
 15511                                  		
 15512                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15513                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15514                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15515                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15516                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15517                                  		;cld
 15518                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15519 00001A4B E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15520                                  
 15521 00001A4E F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15522 00001A50 59                      		pop	cx
 15523 00001A51 5E                      		pop	si
 15524 00001A52 5F                      		pop	di
 15525 00001A53 C3                      		retn
 15526                                  
 15527                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15528                                  
 15529                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15530                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15531                                  ;
 15532                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15533                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15534                                  
 15535                                  check_volume_id:
 15536 00001A54 57                      		push	di
 15537 00001A55 51                      		push	cx
 15538                                  		
 15539                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15540                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15541                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15542                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15543                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15544                                  		;cld
 15545                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15546 00001A56 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15547                                  
 15548 00001A59 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15549 00001A5B 59                      		pop	cx
 15550 00001A5C 5F                      		pop	di
 15551 00001A5D C3                      		retn
 15552                                  
 15553                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15554                                  
 15555                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15556                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15557                                  ;
 15558                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15559                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15560                                  ;
 15561                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15562                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15563                                  ;
 15564                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15565                                  
 15566                                  fat_check:		
 15567 00001A5E 50                      		push	ax
 15568 00001A5F 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15569 00001A61 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15570 00001A64 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15571                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15572 00001A68 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15573 00001A6A 4E                      		dec	si
 15574                                  okret1:					
 15575 00001A6B 58                      		pop	ax
 15576 00001A6C C3                      		retn
 15577                                  
 15578                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15579                                  
 15580                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15581                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15582                                  
 15583                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15584                                  
 15585                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15586                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15587                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15588                                  
 15589                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15590                                  
 15591                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15592                                  		;db 0
 15593                                  
 15594                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15595                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15596                                  
 15597                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15598 00001A6D 00<rep 3h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15599                                  %endif
 15600                                  
 15601                                  ;align 16
 15602                                  
 15603                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15604                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15605                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15606                                  BCODEEND:
 15607                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15608                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15609                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15610                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15611                                  ;SYSINITOFFSET	equ $-$$
 15612                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15613                                  
 15614                                  ; 28/09/2023
 15615                                  S2SIZE equ $-$$
 15616                                  
 15617                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 15618                                  
 15619                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15620                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 15621                                  ; ============================================================================
 15622                                  ; end of BIOSCODE
