 32993                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32994                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 32995                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32996                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32997                                  
 32998                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32999                                  ;
 33000                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 33001                                  ;
 33002                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 33003                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 33004                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 33005                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 33006                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 33007                                  ;
 33008                                  ;	Output : none
 33009                                  ;
 33010                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 33011                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 33012                                  ;
 33013                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33014                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 33015                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 33016                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 33017                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 33018                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33019                                  
 33020                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33021                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33022                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 33023                                  InitDevLoad:
 33024                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33025                                  	;push	es ; *
 33026                                  
 33027                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33028                                  	; ds = cs
 33029 00002FE4 803E[7B1F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33030                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 33031                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 33032 00002FE9 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 33033                                  
 33034                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33035                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33036                                  ; %if 0
 33037                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33038 00002FEB 803E[6B1F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1
 33039                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33040 00002FF0 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 33041                                  
 33042                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 33043                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 33044                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 33045                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 33046                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 33047                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 33048                                  
 33049 00002FF2 E85704                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 33050                                  
 33051 00002FF5 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 33052 00002FF8 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 33053 00002FFB E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 33054 00002FFE 9C                      	pushf
 33055 00002FFF E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 33056 00003002 9D                      	popf
 33057                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 33058                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 33059                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 33060 00003003 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 33061                                  
 33062                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 33063                                  
 33064                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33065                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 33066                                  InitForConv:
 33067                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33068                                  	; ds = cs
 33069 00003005 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 33070                                  					;  current UMB ?
 33071 00003008 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 33072 0000300A E83F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 33073 0000300D E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 33074                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 33075 00003010 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 33076                                  					;  in low memory
 33077                                  InitForHi:
 33078                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33079                                  	; ds = cs
 33080                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 33081                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 33082                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 33083 00003012 A1[711F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 33084 00003015 8B16[6D1F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33085 00003019 0316[6F1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 33086 0000301D EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 33087                                  
 33088                                  InitForLo:
 33089                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33090                                  	; ds = cs
 33091                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 33092 0000301F C606[7B1F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33093                                  initforlo_x:
 33094                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33095                                  	; ds = cs
 33096                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 33097                                  					;  we are loading low
 33098                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = Start of Low memory
 33099                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 33100 00003024 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 33101 00003027 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 33102                                  idl1:
 33103 0000302B E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 33104                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33105                                  	; ds = cs
 33106                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 33107                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 33108                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 33109                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 33110 0000302E A3[5F1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 33111 00003031 8916[611F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 33112 00003035 C706[631F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 33113 0000303B A3[651F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 33114                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33115                                  	;pop	es ; *
 33116 0000303E C3                      	retn
 33117                                  
 33118                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33119                                  ;
 33120                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 33121                                  ;
 33122                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 33123                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 33124                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 33125                                  ;		   current UMB
 33126                                  ;
 33127                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33128                                  
 33129                                  SpaceInUMB:
 33130                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33131                                  	; ds = cs
 33132                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 33133                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 33134                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 33135 0000303F A1[6F1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 33136 00003042 0306[6D1F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 33137 00003046 2B06[711F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 33138                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33139                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 33140                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 33141                                  	;stc
 33142                                  	;retn
 33143                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33144 0000304A 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 33145 0000304D 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 33146                                  spcinumb1:

 33180                                  ;
 33181                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 33182                                  ;

 33283                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 33284                                  ;
 33285                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 33286                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 33287                                  ;
 33288                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 33289                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena

 33813                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33814                                  ;
 33815                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 33816                                  ;
 33817                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 33818                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 33819                                  ;
 33820                                  ;	Returns in AX the number of paras equivalent to the
 33821                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 33822                                  ;
 33823                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 33824                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 33825                                  ;
 33826                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33827                                  
 33828                                  ; 13/05/2019
 33829                                  
 33830                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33831                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 33832                                  
 33833                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33834                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 33835                                  GetHexNum:
 33836 00003218 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 33837 0000321A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33838                                  ghn_next:
 33839 0000321C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 33840 0000321F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 33841 00003222 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 33842 00003224 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 33843 00003227 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 33844 00003229 50                      	push	ax
 33845 0000322A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 33846 0000322C E8D80F                  	call	delim
 33847 0000322F 58                      	pop	ax
 33848                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33849 00003230 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 33850 00003233 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 33851 00003235 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 33852                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 33853                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33854 00003238 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 33855                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33856                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33857                                  ghn_shift1:
 33858 0000323A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 33859 0000323C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 33860 0000323E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 33861 00003240 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 33862 00003242 46                      	inc	si
 33863 00003243 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 33864                                  ghn_into_paras:
 33865 00003245 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 33866 00003248 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 33867 0000324B F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 33868 0000324F 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 33869                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33870                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33871                                  ghn_shift2:
 33872 00003251 F8                      	clc
 33873 00003252 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 33874 00003254 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 33875 00003256 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 33876 00003258 F8                      	clc
 33877 00003259 C3                      	retn
 33878                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33879                                  ghn_err:
 33880                                  gnib_err:
 33881 0000325A F9                      	stc
 33882                                  ghn_ret:
 33883                                  gnib_ret:
 33884 0000325B C3                      	retn

 33887                                  ;
 33888                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 33889                                  ;
 33890                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 33891                                  ;
 33892                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 33893                                  ;
 33894                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 33895                                  ;
 33896                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33897                                  
 33898                                  GetNibble:
 33899 0000325C 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 33900                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 33901                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33902 0000325F 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 33903 00003261 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 33904 00003264 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 33905 00003266 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 33906 00003269 C3                      	retn
 33907                                  is_it_hex:
 33908 0000326A 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 33909                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 33910                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33911 0000326D 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 33912 0000326F 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 33913 00003272 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 33914 00003274 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 33915 00003277 C3                      	retn
 33916                                  
 33917                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33918                                  ;gnib_err:
 33919                                  ;	stc
 33920                                  ;gnib_ret:
 33921                                  ;	retn

 33927                                  ; umb.inc (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 33928                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.
 33929                                  UMB_ARENA	equ 8Ch		; offset of umb_head in DOS data

 33935                                  
 33936                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33937                                  ;
 33938                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 33939                                  ;
 33940                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 33941                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 33942                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 33943                                  ;			; DS = data
 33944                                  ;
 33945                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 33946                                  ;
 33947                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 33948                                  ;
 33949                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33950                                  
 33951                                  umb_insert:
 33952 00003278 1E                      	push	ds
 33953                                  
 33954                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33955                                  	; ds = cs
 33956                                  
 33957                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33958 00003279 8E1E[8A1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 33959                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 33960 0000327D 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 33961 00003281 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 33962 00003283 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33963                                  ui_next:
 33964 00003285 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 33965                                  					;    new block
 33966 00003287 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 33967                                  					; Q: is current block the
 33968                                  					;    last
 33969 00003289 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33970 0000328F 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 33971                                  					; N: get next block
 33972 00003291 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 33973                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 33974 00003293 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33975 00003296 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 33976                                  
 33977                                  ui_insert:
 33978 00003298 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 33979 0000329A 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 33980                                  
 33981 0000329B 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 33982 0000329D F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 33983                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 33984 0000329F C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33985                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 33986 000032A4 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33987                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 33988 000032AA 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 33989                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 33990 000032AE C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33991                                  
 33992                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33993                                  
 33994 000032B4 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33995 000032B6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33996 000032BC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 33997                                  					; mark as free
 33998 000032C3 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 33999                                  					; start & end of new block
 34000 000032C6 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 34001                                  
 34002                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 34003                                  	
 34004 000032CB 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 34005 000032CD 43                      	inc	bx
 34006 000032CE 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 34007 000032D0 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 34008                                  
 34009                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 34010                                  					; this block
 34011 000032D1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 34012                                  	
 34013 000032D3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34014 000032D9 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34015 000032E0 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34016 000032E4 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34017                                  
 34018 000032EB EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 34019                                  
 34020                                  ui_append:
 34021                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 34022 000032ED 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 34023 000032F2 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 34024                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 34025                                  					; block for the next arena.
 34026                                  	; 13/05/2019
 34027 000032F8 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34028                                  
 34029 000032FE 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 34030 00003300 40                      	inc	ax
 34031 00003301 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 34032                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 34033 00003303 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34034                                  
 34035 00003305 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 34036                                  
 34037 00003307 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34038 0000330D 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34039 00003314 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34040 00003318 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 34041                                  
 34042                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34043 0000331F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34044 00003321 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 34045 00003327 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 34046                                  					; mark as free
 34047 0000332E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34048 0000332F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34049                                  ui_done:
 34050                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 34051 00003334 1F                      	pop	ds
 34052                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34053                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34054                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 34055 00003335 C3                      	retn

 34070                                  au_next:

 34072 0000333E 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 34073 00003340 E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 34074 00003343 EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 34075                                  au_coalesce:
 34076                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34077                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 34078                                  ;au_exit:
 34079                                  ;	; 31/12/2022

 34086                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34087                                  
 34088                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34089                                  
 34090                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34091                                  ;
 34092                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 34093                                  ;
 34094                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 34095                                  ;	if it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 34096                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 34097                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 34098                                  ;
 34099                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 34100                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 34101                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 34102                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 34103                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 34104                                  ;
 34105                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34106                                  
 34107                                  umb_coalesce:
 34108                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34109                                  	; ds = cs
 34110 00003345 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 34111                                  
 34112 00003346 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 34113                                  
 34114                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34115                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34116 00003348 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34117 0000334C 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 34118                                  uc_nextfree:
 34119 00003351 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34120 00003353 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34121                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 34122 00003355 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 34123 0000335A 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 34124                                  					; N: get next arena
 34125 0000335C E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34126 0000335F 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34127 00003361 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 34128                                  uc_again:
 34129 00003363 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34130 00003366 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34131                                  uc_check:
 34132 00003368 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 34133 0000336D 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 34134                                  					; Y: coalesce
 34135 0000336F 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 34136 00003374 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 34137                                  	;add	[3],cx
 34138 00003375 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 34139 00003379 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 34140 0000337C 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 34141 0000337E EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 34142                                  
 34143                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34144                                  ;uc_done:
 34145                                  	;retn

 34167                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es
 34168 00003392 891E[731F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 34169 00003396 8C06[751F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 34170                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34171 0000339A 803E[891F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0 
 34172                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0 ; have we already linked a UMB?
 34173                                  	;jne	short ia_1		; quit if we already did it
 34174                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34175 0000339F 770A                    	ja	short ia_1 ; cf=0
 34176 000033A1 E83900                  	call	LinkFirstUMB		; else link the first UMB

 34178                                  	; 12/12/2022

 34180                                  	; 31/12/2022

 34191                                  iau_err2:

 34194                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34195                                  ;
 34196                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 34197                                  ;
 34198                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 34199                                  ;
 34200                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 34201                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 34202                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 34203                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 34204                                  ;				NC
 34205                                  ;			  else 
 34206                                  ;				CY
 34207                                  ;
 34208                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 34209                                  ;
 34210                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34211                                  
 34212                                  umb_allocate:
 34213                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34214                                  	; ds = cs
 34215 000033AE 50                      	push	ax
 34216 000033AF B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 34217 000033B1 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 34218                                  					;   possible
 34219                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34220 000033B4 FF1E[731F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 34221                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34222                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 34223                                  					; the largest UMB
 34224 000033B8 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 34225 000033BA 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 34226                                  	
 34227 000033BC B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 34228                                  
 34229                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34230 000033BE FF1E[731F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 34231                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34232                                  
 34233 000033C2 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 34234                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 34235                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34236 000033C5 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 34237                                  ua_err:
 34238 000033C7 F9                      	stc	
 34239                                  
 34240                                  	;clc
 34241                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34242                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34243                                  	; cf=0
 34244                                  	;clc 
 34245                                  ua_done:
 34246 000033C8 58                      	pop	ax
 34247 000033C9 C3                      	retn
 34248                                  	; 27/07/2023
 34249                                  ;ua_err:
 34250                                  	;stc
 34251                                  	;jmp	short ua_done
 34252                                  
 34253                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34254                                  ;
 34255                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 34256                                  ;
 34257                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 34258                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 34259                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 34260                                  ;
 34261                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34262                                  
 34263                                  	; 01/11/2022
 34264                                  get_next:
 34265 000033CA 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34266 000033CF 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 34267                                  _get_next_:
 34268 000033D1 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 34269 000033D3 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 34270 000033D7 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 34271 000033D8 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34272                                  	;clc
 34273                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34274                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34275                                  	; cf=0
 34276                                  	;clc
 34277 000033DA C3                      	retn
 34278                                  gn_err:
 34279 000033DB F9                      	stc
 34280                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 34281                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 34282 000033DC C3                      	retn

 34284                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34285                                  ;
 34286                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 34287                                  ;
 34288                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34289                                  
 34290                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34291                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 34292                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 34293                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34294                                  	; ds = cs
 34295 000033DD E8CEFF                  	call	umb_allocate
 34296 000033E0 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34297                                  
 34298                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 34299                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 34300                                  
 34301                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34302                                  	; ds = cs
 34303                                  
 34304 000033E2 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 34305 000033E4 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 34306 000033E6 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 34307                                  
 34308 000033E8 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 34309 000033EA 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 34310                                  
 34311 000033EC F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34312                                  
 34313                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 34314                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34315 000033EE 49                      	dec	cx
 34316 000033EF 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 34317                                  	
 34318 000033F1 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34319 000033F7 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34320                                  					
 34321 000033FE 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34322 00003402 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34323                                  
 34324                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 34325                                  
 34326 00003409 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 34327 0000340B 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34328 00003411 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 34329                                  					; mark as free 
 34330 00003418 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34331 00003419 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34332                                  
 34333                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34334                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34335 0000341E 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 34336                                  	; 18/09/2023
 34337 00003422 26890E8C00              	mov	[es:UMB_ARENA],cx
 34338                                  	;mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 34339                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 34340                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 34341                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 34342                                  
 34343                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 34344                                  
 34345                                  	;mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 34346                                  	;mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 34347                                  	; 18/09/2023
 34348 00003427 268E062400              	mov	es,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34349 0000342C 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 34350                                  ;scan_next
 34351                                  ; 09/12/2022
 34352                                  scannext:
 34353 0000342E 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 34354 00003432 740C                    	je	short got_last
 34355                                  	
 34356 00003434 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34357 00003436 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34358 0000343B 40                      	inc	ax
 34359 0000343C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34360                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 34361                                  	; 09/12/2022
 34362 0000343E EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 34363                                  got_last:
 34364                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 34365                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34366 00003440 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34367                                  
 34368 00003445 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34369                                  	;clc
 34370                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34371                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34372                                  	; cf=0
 34373                                  	;clc
 34374 0000344B C3                      	retn
 34375                                  
 34376                                  ; 11/12/2022
 34377                                  ;;lfu_err:
 34378                                  ;	;stc
 34379                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34380                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 34381                                  ;	; cf=1
 34382                                  ;	;stc
 34383                                  ;	retn
 34384                                  
 34385                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34386                                  ;
 34387                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 34388                                  ;
 34389                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 34390                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 34391                                  ;
 34392                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34393                                  
 34394                                  ShrinkUMB:
 34395                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34396                                  	; ds = cs
 34397 0000344C 833E[6D1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 34398                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 34399 00003451 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 34400 00003453 06                      	push	es
 34401                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34402                                  	;push	bx
 34403                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34404                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 34405                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34406                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34407 00003454 8B1E[711F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 34408 00003458 2B1E[6D1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34409 0000345C 8E06[6D1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 34410                                  	
 34411 00003460 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 34412 00003463 CD21                    	int	21h
 34413                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 34414                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 34415                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 34416 00003465 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34417 00003467 48                      	dec	ax
 34418 00003468 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34419 0000346A 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 34420                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34421                                  	;pop	bx
 34422 00003471 07                      	pop	es
 34423                                  su_exit:
 34424 00003472 C3                      	retn

 34427                                  ;
 34428                                  ; procedure : UnlinkUMB
 34429                                  ;
 34430                                  ;	Unlinks the UMBs from the DOS arena chain
 34431                                  ;
 34432                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34433                                  
 34434                                  UnlinkUMB:
 34435                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34436                                  	; ds = cs
 34437 00003473 1E                      	push	ds
 34438 00003474 06                      	push	es
 34439                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34440 00003475 803E[891F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 34441                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 34442 0000347A 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 34443                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34444 0000347C 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34445                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 34446 00003480 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34447 00003485 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 34448                                  ulu_next:
 34449 0000348A E83DFF                  	call	get_next
 34450 0000348D 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 34451 0000348F 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 34452 00003491 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 34453 00003493 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34454 00003495 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 34455                                  ulu_found:
 34456                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 34457 00003497 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34458                                  ulu_x:
 34459 0000349C 07                      	pop	es
 34460 0000349D 1F                      	pop	ds
 34461 0000349E C3                      	retn

 34463                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34464                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 34465                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34466                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34467                                  
 34468                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34469                                  ;
 34470                                  ; Summary:
 34471                                  ;
 34472                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 34473                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 34474                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 34475                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 34476                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 34477                                  ;
 34478                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 34479                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 34480                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 34481                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 34482                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 34483                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 34484                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 34485                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 34486                                  ;
 34487                                  ; Example:
 34488                                  ;
 34489                                  ;   [menu]
 34490                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34491                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34492                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34493                                  ;
 34494                                  ;   [network]
 34495                                  ;   include misc
 34496                                  ;   device=foo
 34497                                  ;
 34498                                  ;   [misc]
 34499                                  ;   device=bar
 34500                                  ;   include alternate
 34501                                  ;
 34502                                  ;   [alternate]
 34503                                  ;   device=tar
 34504                                  ;
 34505                                  ;
 34506                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34507                                  ;
 34508                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34509                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34510                                  ;
 34511                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34512                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34513                                  ;   following order:
 34514                                  ;
 34515                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34516                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34517                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34518                                  ;
 34519                                  
 34520                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34521                                  
 34522                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34523                                  
 34524                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34525                                  
 34526                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34527                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34528                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34529                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 34530                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 34531                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 34532                                  
 34533                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34534                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34535                                  
 34536                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 34537                                  
 34538                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34539                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34540                                  
 34541 0000349F 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 34542

 34544                                  ;
 34545                                  ; procedure : setparms
 34546                                  ;
 34547                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 34548                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 34549                                  ;
 34550                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34551                                  
 34552                                  setparms:
 34553 000034A0 1E                      	push	ds
 34554 000034A1 50                      	push	ax
 34555 000034A2 53                      	push	bx
 34556 000034A3 51                      	push	cx
 34557 000034A4 52                      	push	dx
 34558                                  
 34559 000034A5 0E                      	push	cs
 34560 000034A6 1F                      	pop	ds
 34561                                  
 34562 000034A7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 34563 000034A9 8A1E[5B49]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 34564                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34565 000034AD 43                      	inc	bx
 34566                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 34567                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 34568 000034AE BA[3348]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 34569                                  	;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 34570                                  	;mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 34571                                  	; 04/07/2023
 34572 000034B1 B80D44                  	mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8)|GENERIC_IOCTL
 34573                                  	;mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 34574                                  	;mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 34575                                  	; 04/07/2023
 34576 000034B4 B94008                  	mov	cx,(RAWIO<<8)|SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS 
 34577 000034B7 CD21                    	int	21h
 34578                                  
 34579                                  ; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34580 000034B9 8A26[5C49]              	mov	ah,[switches]
 34581                                  	;mov	al,[deviceparameters+20]
 34582 000034BD A0[4748]                	mov	al,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 34583 000034C0 8A0E[5B49]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 34584                                  ;
 34585                                  ;; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34586                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 34587                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 34588                                  ;	; 21/10/2022
 34589                                  ;	;mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 34590                                  ;	;mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 34591                                  ;
 34592                                  ;	; 27/07/2023
 34593                                  ;	;;test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 34594                                  ;	;test	byte [cs:switches],flagec35
 34595                                  ;	;jz	short not_ec35
 34596                                  ;
 34597                                  ;	; 27/07/2023
 34598                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34599                                  ;	;;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 34600                                  ;	; 12/12/2022
 34601                                  ;	;test	byte [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 34602                                  ;	;jz	short eot_ok
 34603                                  ;	
 34604                                  	;mov	cl,[cs:drive]		; which drive was this for?
 34605                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34606                                  	;mov	cl,[drive]
 34607                                  	; 27/07/2023
 34608                                  	;mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 34609                                  	;mov	ds,ax
 34610                                  
 34611 000034C4 BA7000                  	mov	dx,DOSBIODATASEG
 34612 000034C7 8EDA                    	mov	ds,dx
 34613

 34615 000034CC 7408                    	jz	short not_ec35
 34616                                  
 34617                                  	;mov	al,1			; assume drive 0
 34618                                  	;shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive
 34619                                  	;;or	[531h],al ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EACh)
 34620                                  	;or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags
 34621                                  	; 27/07/2023
 34622 000034CE B401                    	mov	ah,1
 34623 000034D0 D2E4                    	shl	ah,cl
 34624 000034D2 0826[2905]              	or	[ec35_flag],ah
 34625                                  
 34626                                  ; 07/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34627                                  ;	MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYINIT:3EB0h	
 34628                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34629                                  not_ec35:

 34631                                  ;	sectors per track than any old ones.
 34632                                  
 34633                                  	; 27/07/2023
 34634                                  	;;mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+20]
 34635                                  	;mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 34636

 34638 000034D6 3A06[2C01]              	cmp	al,[eot]
 34639 000034DA 7603                    	jbe	short eot_ok
 34640 000034DC A2[2C01]                	mov	[eot],al
 34641                                  eot_ok:
 34642 000034DF 5A                      	pop	dx			; fix up all the registers
 34643 000034E0 59                      	pop	cx
 34644 000034E1 5B                      	pop	bx
 34645 000034E2 58                      	pop	ax
 34646 000034E3 1F                      	pop	ds ; 13/05/2019
 34647 000034E4 C3                      	retn

 34679                                  ; procedure : parseline
 34680                                  ;
 34681                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 34682                                  ;
 34683                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34684                                  
 34685                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34686                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 34687                                  
 34688                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34689                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 34690                                  parseline:
 34691                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34692                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 34693                                  
 34694                                  	;push	ds ; *
 34695                                  
 34696                                  	;push	cs ; *
 34697                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 34698                                  
 34699                                  nextswtch:
 34700                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 34701                                  	je	short done_line
 34702                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 34703                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 34704                                  
 34705                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 34706                                  
 34707                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 34708                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 34709                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 34710                                  	je	short getparm
 34711                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 34712                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 34713                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34714                                  swterr:
 34715                                  	retn
 34716                                  
 34717                                  getparm:
 34718                                  	call	check_switch
 34719                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 34720                                  	jc	short swterr
 34721                                  getnext:
 34722                                  	call	getchr
 34723                                  	;jc	short done_line
 34724                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 34725                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34726                                  	jnc	short nextswtch
 34727                                  ;swterr:
 34728                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 34729                                  
 34730                                  done_line:
 34731                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34732                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 34733                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 34734                                  	jnz	short okay
 34735                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 34736                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 34737                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34738                                  	retn
 34739                                  
 34740                                  okay:
 34741                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 34742                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 34743                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 34744                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 34745                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 34746                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34747                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34748                                  	; cf=0
 34749                                  	;clc
 34750                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 34751                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34752                                  	jmp	setdeviceparameters
 34753                                  ;exitpl:
 34754                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34755                                  	; ds = cs
 34756                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 34757                                  	retn
 34758                                  put_back:
 34759                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 34760                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 34761                                  	jmp	short done_line
 34762                                  
 34763                                  %endif

 34766                                  ;
 34767                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 34768                                  ;
 34769                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 34770                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 34771                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 34772                                  ; error.
 34773                                  ;
 34774                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34775                                  
 34776                                  ; 09/09/2023
 34777                                  
 34778                                  err_swtch:
 34779 00003501 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 34780                                  err_check:
 34781 00003503 F9                      	stc
 34782                                  err_chk:
 34783                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 34784 00003504 C3                      	retn
 34785                                  
 34786                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)

 34793 0000350C 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'

 34848                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 34849                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 34850                                  
 34851                                  	; 09/09/2023

 34865                                  ; procedure : process_num
 34866                                  ;
 34867                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 34868                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 34869                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 34870                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 34871                                  ;

 34896

 34900                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 34901                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34902                                  	; cf=0
 34903 00003567 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 34904                                  try_t:

 34923 00003578 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 34924 0000357A A3[5949]                	mov	[slim],ax
 34925                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34926                                  	;jmp	short done_ret

 35042                                  ;
 35043                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 35044                                  ;
 35045                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 35046                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 35047                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 35048                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 35049                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 35050                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 35051                                  ;
 35052                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 35053                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 35054                                  ;
 35055                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 35056                                  ;
 35057                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35058                                  
 35059                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35060                                  
 35061                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35062                                  
 35063                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35064                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 35065                                  
 35066                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35067                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 35068                                  
 35069                                  setdeviceparameters:
 35070                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35071                                  	; ds = cs
 35072                                  
 35073 000035C4 06                      	push	es
 35074

 35076 000035C6 07                      	pop	es
 35077                                  
 35078 000035C7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx

 35081 000035D0 7506                    	jne	short got_80

 35083 000035D2 C706[3748]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35084                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 35085                                  got_80:

 35087 000035DA 8BB7[DC49]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb

 35121                                  heads_not_altered:
 35122                                  
 35123                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 35124                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 35125

 35127                                  	; 02/11/2022

 35129                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35130 00003602 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 35131 00003605 A2[3C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 35132

 35134

 35136

 35138                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35139 0000360A 8A3E[4448]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 35140                                  	
 35141                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35142                                  	; ax = 2
 35143 0000360E 3906[4948]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 35144                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 35145 00003612 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediaid ; just use default if heads>2
 35146                                  
 35147 00003614 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 35148                                  
 35149                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 35150                                  
 35151 00003616 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 35152                                  
 35153                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 35154                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 35155                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 35156                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 35157                                  
 35158                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 35159                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 35160                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 35161                                  
 35162 00003618 833E[4748]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 35163 0000361D 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 35164 0000361F 833E[3748]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 35165 00003624 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 35166                                  
 35167                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 35168                                  
 35169 00003626 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35170                                  
 35171                                  ;	check for 320K
 35172                                  
 35173                                  not_144m:
 35174 00003628 833E[3748]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35175 0000362D 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediaid
 35176 0000362F 833E[4748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35177 00003634 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediaid
 35178                                  
 35179 00003636 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 35180 00003638 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediaid
 35181                                  
 35182                                  only_one_head:
 35183                                  
 35184                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 35185                                  
 35186 0000363A 803E[3448]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35187 0000363F 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35188

 35642 000037F0 E81C0A                  	call	org_delim		; skip delimiters except '/' (mrw 4/88)
 35643 000037F3 74F3                    	jz	short org4
 35644 000037F5 EB08                    	jmp	short org51
 35645                                  
 35646                                  org5:					; rest of the line
 35647 000037F7 E87200                  	call	skip_comment		; comment?
 35648 000037FA 74CE                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 35649 000037FC E85300                  	call	get2			; not a comment.
 35650                                  
 35651                                  org51:
 35652 000037FF AA                      	stosb				; copy the character
 35653 00003800 3C22                    	cmp	al,'"' 	; 22h		; a quote ?
 35654 00003802 743A                    	je	short at_quote
 35655 00003804 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '  ; 20h
 35656 00003806 77EF                    	ja	short org5
 35657                                  	
 35658                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35659                                  	; (Note: PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM does not contain M051 modification)
 35660                                  
 35661                                  					; M051 - Start
 35662                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35663                                  	; ds = cs
 35664 00003808 803E[5403]55                    cmp	byte [cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH
 35665                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH ; Q: is this devicehigh
 35666 0000380D 7514                    	jne	short not_dh		; N: 
 35667 0000380F 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; Q: is this line feed
 35668 00003811 7416                    	je	short org_dhlf		; Y: stuff a blank before the lf
 35669 00003813 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; Q: is this a cr
 35670 00003815 75E0                    	jne	short org5		; N: 
 35671 00003817 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite cr with blank
 35672 0000381C AA                      	stosb				; put cr after blank
 35673 0000381D FE06[9F34]              	inc	byte [insert_blank]
 35674                                  	;inc	byte [cs:insert_blank]	; indicate that blank has been 
 35675                                  					; inserted
 35676 00003821 EBD4                    	jmp	short org5
 35677                                  not_dh:					; M051 - End
 35678                                  
 35679 00003823 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line feed?
 35680 00003825 740F                    	je	short org1_brdg		; handles the next command line.
 35681 00003827 EBCE                    	jmp	short org5		; handles next char in this line.
 35682                                  
 35683                                  org_dhlf:				; M051 - Start
 35684                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35685                                  	; ds = cs
 35686 00003829 803E[9F34]01            	cmp	byte [insert_blank],1
 35687                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:insert_blank],1 ; Q:has a blank already been inserted
 35688 0000382E 7406                    	je	short org1_brdg		; Y:
 35689 00003830 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite lf with blank
 35690 00003835 AA                      	stosb				; put lf after blank
 35691                                  					; M051 - End
 35692                                  org1_brdg:
 35693 00003836 C606[9F34]00            	mov	byte [insert_blank],0

 35695                                  					; M051: devicehigh
 35696 0000383B E93CFE                  	jmp	org1
