 35714                                  ;
 35715                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35716                                  
 35717                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35718                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)
 35719

 35724                                  	;
 35725                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35726                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 35727                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35728 00003854 26                      	es	
 35729 00003855 AC                      	lodsb
 35730                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 35731                                  	;inc	si
 35732                                  	;
 35733 00003856 49                      	dec	cx
 35734 00003857 C3                      	retn
 35735                                  noget:
 35736 00003858 59                      	pop	cx
 35737                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35738                                  	; ds = cs
 35739                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 35740                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 35741 00003859 893E[5603]              	mov	[count],di
 35742 0000385D 893E[5803]              	mov	[org_count],di
 35743 00003861 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 35744                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 35745 00003863 8936[5A03]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 35746                                  
 35747                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35748                                  
 35749                                  ; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35750                                  
 35751                                  ;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 35752                                  ;	retn
 35753                                  ;else
 35754                                  
 35755                                  ;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 35756                                  ;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 35757                                  ;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 35758                                  
 35759 00003867 89F9                    	mov     cx,di
 35760 00003869 E9E300                  	jmp     menu_check
 35761

 35767                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35768                                  ;
 35769                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 35770                                  ;
 35771                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 35772                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 35773                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 35774                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 35775                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 35776                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 35777                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 35778                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 35779                                  ;
 35780                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35781                                  
 35782                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35783                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 35784                                  
 35785                                  skip_comment:
 35786 0000386C E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 35787                                  
 35788                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35789                                  	; ds = cs	
 35790                                  
 35791 0000386E 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 35792                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 35793 00003873 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 35794                                  
 35795 00003875 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 35796                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 35797 0000387A 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 35798                                  
 35799 0000387C 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35800                                  	
 35801 0000387F 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 35802                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 35803 00003883 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 35804                                  
 35805 00003885 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 35806                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 35807 0000388A 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35808                                  
 35809 0000388C 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 35810                                  	
 35811 00003890 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 35812                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 35813 00003894 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 35814                                  skip_cmmt:
 35815 00003896 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 35816 00003898 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35817 0000389B 46                      	inc	si
 35818 0000389C 49                      	dec	cx
 35819 0000389D 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 35820 0000389F 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35821                                  no_commt:
 35822 000038A1 C3                      	retn

 35832                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35833                                  ;
 35834                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 35835                                  ;
 35836                                  ;   INPUT
 35837                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35838                                  ;
 35839                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35840                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 35841                                  ;
 35842                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35843                                  ;       All
 35844                                  ;
 35845                                  ;   HISTORY
 35846                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35847                                  ;
 35848                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35849                                  
 35850                                  kbd_read:
 35851 000038A2 F606[FF46]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 35852 000038A7 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 35853                                  
 35854 000038A9 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 35855 000038AA 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 35856 000038AC 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 35857                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 35858                                  kbd_loop:
 35859 000038AE B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 35860 000038B0 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 35861 000038B2 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 35862 000038B4 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35863 000038B6 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35864 000038B8 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35865 000038BA 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 35866 000038BC A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 35867                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 35868                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35869 000038BF 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 35870                                  
 35871 000038C4 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 35872 000038C6 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 35873                                  kbd_loopdone:
 35874 000038C8 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 35875                                  kbd_nodelay:
 35876 000038C9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 35877 000038CB B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35878 000038CD CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35879 000038CF A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35880 000038D1 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 35881 000038D3 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 35882 000038D4 43                              inc     bx
 35883                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 35884 000038D5 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35885                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 35886 000038DA B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 35887 000038DC CD16                            int     16h             ;
 35888 000038DE 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 35889 000038E0 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 35890 000038E2 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 35891                                  
 35892                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 35893 000038E4 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 35894 000038E7 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 35895                                  	
 35896 000038E9 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35897 000038EC 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 35898                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 35899 000038EE BA[974B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 35900 000038F1 E8DD0B                          call    print
 35901                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 35902 000038F4 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 35903 000038F9 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 35904                                  kbd_notf5:
 35905                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 35906 000038FB 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 35907 000038FE 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 35908                                  
 35909 00003900 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35910 00003903 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 35911                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 35912 00003905 BA[D54B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 35913 00003908 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 35914 0000390B B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 35915 0000390D 881E[0347]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 35916                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 35917 00003911 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 35918 00003913 CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 35919 00003915 C606[0947]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 35920 0000391A 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 35921 0000391C 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 35922                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 35923 0000391E 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 35924 00003921 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 35925                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 35926 00003923 E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 35927 00003926 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 35928 00003927 C3                              retn			;
 35929                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 35930 00003928 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 35931 00003929 C3                              retn			;
 35932                                  
 35933                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35934                                  ;
 35935                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 35936                                  ;
 35937                                  ;   INPUT
 35938                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 35939                                  ;
 35940                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35941                                  ;       None
 35942                                  ;
 35943                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35944                                  ;       None
 35945                                  ;
 35946                                  ;   HISTORY
 35947                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35948                                  ;
 35949                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35950                                  
 35951                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 35952                                  
 35953                                  set_numlock:
 35954                                          ; 04/01/2023
 35955                                  	;push	ax
 35956 0000392A 1E                              push    ds
 35957 0000392B 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 35958 0000392D 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 35959 0000392F 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 35960 00003932 2E3B06[724B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 35961 00003937 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 35962 00003939 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 35963 0000393E EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 35964                                  not_off:
 35965 00003940 2E3B06[704B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 35966 00003945 F9                              stc
 35967 00003946 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 35968 00003948 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 35969                                  set_done:
 35970 0000394D 1F                              pop     ds
 35971                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35972                                  	;pop	ax
 35973 0000394E C3                              retn
 35974                                  
 35975                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35976                                  
 35977                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35978                                  ;
 35979                                  ;   menu_check: check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 35980                                  ;
 35981                                  ;   INPUT
 35982                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 35983                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 35984                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35985                                  ;
 35986                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35987                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 35988                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 35989                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 35990                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 35991                                  ;
 35992                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35993                                  ;       All
 35994                                  ;
 35995                                  ;   NOTES
 35996                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 35997                                  ;
 35998                                  ;   HISTORY
 35999                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36000                                  ;
 36001                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36002                                  
 36003                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36004                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 36005                                  
 36006                                  menu_check:
 36007                                  
 36008                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 36009                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 36010                                  
 36011 0000394F 51                              push    cx              ;
 36012 00003950 56                              push    si              ;
 36013 00003951 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 36014                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 36015 00003953 E83507                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36016 00003956 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 36017 00003958 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 36018 0000395A 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 36019 0000395C 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 36020 0000395D EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36021                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 36022 0000395F 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 36023 00003961 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 36024 00003963 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 36025 00003965 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 36026 00003967 E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 36027 0000396A 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 36028 0000396F EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36029                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 36030 00003971 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 36031 00003973 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 36032                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 36033 00003975 E81307                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 36034                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 36035 00003978 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 36036 0000397A 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 36037 0000397C 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 36038 0000397E 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 36039 00003980 E80807                          call    get_char        ;
 36040 00003983 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 36041 00003985 3A06[B91E]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 36042 00003989 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 36043 0000398B 800E[FF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36044 00003990 EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36045                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 36046 00003992 3A06[C51E]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 36047 00003996 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 36048 00003998 800E[FF46]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 36049 0000399D EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36050                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 36051 0000399F E8C306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36052 000039A2 EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 36053                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 36054 000039A4 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36055 000039A5 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36056                                  
 36057                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 36058                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 36059                                  
 36060 000039A6 F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36061 000039AB 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 36062                                  ;
 36063                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 36064                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 36065                                  ;
 36066 000039AD E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 36067 000039B0 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 36068 000039B2 E9EE01                          jmp	menu_abort
 36069                                  
 36070                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 36071                                  
 36072                                  menu_search:
 36073 000039B5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 36074 000039B7 BF[4447]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 36075 000039BA E80304                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 36076 000039BD 7337                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 36077 000039BF C606[3C47]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 36078 000039C4 E90C02                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 36079                                  
 36080                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 36081                                  
 36082                                  menu_color:
 36083 000039C7 51                      	push	cx              ;
 36084 000039C8 52                      	push	dx              ;
 36085                                  	;;mov	dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 36086                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36087                                  	;mov	dl,7 ; !*!
 36088 000039C9 E89E06                  	call	get_number	; get first number
 36089 000039CC 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh  ; !**!	; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 36090 000039CF 88DD                    	mov	ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 36091                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 36092                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 36093                                  	;and	dl,0F0h	; !*!	; (low nibble of dl would be zero)
 36094                                  	;or	dl,bl		; (low nibble of dl is 7) ! 14/08/2023
 36095 000039D1 88DA                    	mov	dl,bl	; 14/08/2023
 36096 000039D3 E83108                  	call	delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 36097 000039D6 750E                    	jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 36098 000039D8 E88F06                  	call	get_number	; get next number
 36099 000039DB 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 36100 000039DE 88DE                    	mov	dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 36101                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36102                                  	;and	dl,0Fh	; !**!	;
 36103 000039E0 B104                    	mov	cl,4            ;
 36104 000039E2 D2E3                    	shl	bl,cl           ;
 36105 000039E4 08DA                    	or	dl,bl           ;
 36106                                  check_color:
 36107 000039E6 38F5                    	cmp	ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 36108 000039E8 7503                    	jne	short set_color	; no
 36109 000039EA 80F208                  	xor	dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 36110                                  set_color:
 36111 000039ED 8816[FA46]              	mov	[bMenuColor],dl ;
 36112 000039F1 5A                      	pop	dx              ;

 36115                                  
 36116                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 36117                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 36118                                  
 36119                                  menu_found:
 36120 000039F6 C606[0447]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 36121                                          ;mov	word [offDefBlock],0
 36122 000039FB C606[0847]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1

 36126 00003A07 8916[0647]              	mov	[offDefBlock],dx ; 0
 36127                                  
 36128 00003A0B E85706                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 36129                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36130                                  	;sub	dx,dx		; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 36131                                  
 36132                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 36133                                  
 36134                                  menu_process:
 36135 00003A0E E87A06                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line

 36162                                  
 36163                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 36164

 36167 00003A47 803E[0947]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 36168 00003A4C 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 36169 00003A4E E8EA05                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 36170 00003A51 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 36171 00003A53 E8FB05                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 36172 00003A56 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;

 36175 00003A5D 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 36176                                  	;jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 36177 00003A60 7602                            jna	short timeout_ok ; 01/08/2023
 36178 00003A62 B35A                    	mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 36179                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 36180 00003A64 881E[0847]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 36181                                  timeout_skip:

 36183                                  
 36184                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 36185                                  
 36186                                  menu_item:
 36187                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023

 36196                                  
 36197                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 36198                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 36199                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 36200

 36203 00003A7D 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 36204 00003A7F 8887[0A47]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al

 36206

 36209                                  ;   description...

 36220                                  
 36221                                  menu_nextitem:
 36222 00003A9F E8C305                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36223 00003AA2 E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 36224                                  
 36225                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 36226                                  
 36227                                  menu_getdefault:
 36228 00003AA5 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 36229 00003AA7 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 36230 00003AA9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 36231 00003AAB E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 36232                                  menu_valid:
 36233 00003AAE 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 36234 00003AB0 8816[0547]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 36235 00003AB4 8B3E[0647]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 36236 00003AB8 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 36237 00003ABA 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 36238 00003ABC 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 36239                                  menu_chkdefault:
 36240 00003ABD 53                              push    bx              ;
 36241 00003ABE 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36242 00003AC0 8BB7[1447]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36243 00003AC4 B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 36244 00003AC7 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36245 00003AC8 06                              push    es              ;
 36246 00003AC9 1F                              pop     ds              ;

 36248 00003ACD 1F                              pop     ds              ;

 36254                                  menu_nodefault:

 36256                                  menu_setdefault:
 36257 00003ADA 881E[0447]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 36258                                  
 36259                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 36260                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 36261                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 36262                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 36263                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 36264                                  ;   with no timeout)
 36265                                  
 36266 00003ADE 803E[0847]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 36267 00003AE3 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no

 36281 00003AFB 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 36282 00003AFD 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 36283 00003B01 A3[0147]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled

 36287 00003B0E CD10                            int     10h             ;

 36290 00003B17 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 36291                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 36292 00003B19 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 36293 00003B1E FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 36294                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 36295 00003B20 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 36296 00003B25 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 36297 00003B27 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 36298 00003B29 8A36[FE46]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 36299                                  menu_clear:
 36300 00003B2D CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 36301 00003B2F 07                              pop     es              ;

 36305                                  
 36306 00003B3A F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1

 36312 00003B4D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36313 00003B4F BA[604C]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine

 36316 00003B57 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36317 00003B59 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;

 36319                                  
 36320                                  menu_nostatus:
 36321 00003B60 BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 36322                                  menu_disploop:

 36324 00003B66 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"? because it's a 1-byte opcode

 36326 00003B6B 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 36327

 36329

 36333 00003B74 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;

 36335 00003B7A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36336

 36341 00003B88 E84609                          call    print           ;

 36343 00003B8F 800E[FF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36344 00003B94 E86704                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 36345 00003B97 8F06[FF46]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 36346                                  
 36347                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 36348                                  
 36349                                  menu_autoselect:
 36350 00003B9B 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1 ; 0FFFFh	; clean boot requested?
 36351 00003B9E 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no

 36353                                  menu_abort:

 36355 00003BA5 E9E400                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 36356                                  
 36357                                  normal_boot:
 36358 00003BA8 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; back to top-level menu?
 36359 00003BAB 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 36360 00003BAD 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 36361 00003BB1 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36362 00003BB3 E9FFFD                          jmp     menu_search
 36363                                  
 36364                                  not_topmenu:
 36365 00003BB6 80BF[0A47]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 36366 00003BBB 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 36367 00003BBD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36368 00003BBF 8BBF[1447]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36369 00003BC3 E8E101                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 36370 00003BC6 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36371 00003BC8 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 36372 00003BCA E929FE                          jmp     menu_found
 36373                                  
 36374                                  not_submenu:
 36375 00003BCD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 36376 00003BCF 8B9F[1447]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36377                                  
 36378                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 36379                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 36380                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 36381                                  
 36382                                  no_selection:
 36383 00003BD3 891E[0647]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 36384 00003BD7 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 36385 00003BDB 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36386 00003BDD 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36387 00003BDE 8E1E[B614]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 36388 00003BE2 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36389                                  
 36390                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 36391                                  ;
 36392                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 36393                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 36394                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 36395                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 36396                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 36397                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 36398                                  ;
 36399                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 36400                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 36401                                  
 36402                                  copyblock_loop:
 36403 00003BE4 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 36404 00003BE5 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 36405 00003BE8 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36406 00003BE9 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36407                                  
 36408                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 36409                                  
 36410                                  copyblock_begin:
 36411                                  
 36412                                  ; 10/09/2023
 36413                                  %if 0
 36414                                          push    ax              ;
 36415                                          push    cx              ;
 36416                                          push    si              ;
 36417                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 36418                                          mov     di,szCommon
 36419                                          push    ds              ;
 36420                                          push    cs              ;
 36421                                          pop     ds              ;
 36422                                          call    comp_names      ;
 36423                                          pop     ds              ;
 36424                                          pop     di              ;
 36425                                          pop     si              ;
 36426                                          pop     cx              ;
 36427                                          pop     ax              ;
 36428                                          je	short copyblock_check
 36429                                  %endif
 36430                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36431 00003BEB 57                      	push	di
 36432 00003BEC BF[4947]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 36433 00003BEF E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 36434 00003BF2 5F                      	pop	di
 36435 00003BF3 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 36436                                  
 36437 00003BF5 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 36438 00003BF7 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 36439 00003BF9 57                              push    di              ;
 36440 00003BFA 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 36441 00003BFC 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36442 00003BFD 06                              push    es              ;
 36443 00003BFE 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36444 00003BFF E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 36445 00003C02 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36446 00003C03 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36447                                  copyblock_check:
 36448 00003C04 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36449 00003C06 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 36450 00003C08 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36451 00003C0B EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 36452                                  
 36453                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 36454 00003C0D E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 36455 00003C10 E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 36456 00003C13 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36457 00003C15 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36458 00003C17 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 36459 00003C19 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 36460 00003C1B EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 36461                                  ;
 36462                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 36463                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 36464                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 36465                                  ;
 36466                                  move_config:
 36467 00003C1D 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 36468 00003C1F 51                              push    cx              ;
 36469                                  ;
 36470                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 36471                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 36472                                  ;
 36473                                   	;mov	cx,7
 36474 00003C20 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 36475 00003C23 BE[3C47]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 36476 00003C26 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 36477                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 36478                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 36479                                  copy_boot: 
 36480                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 36481 00003C27 2E                              cs
 36482 00003C28 AC                      	lodsb
 36483 00003C29 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 36484 00003C2B 47                              inc     di              ;
 36485 00003C2C E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 36486                                  
 36487 00003C2E 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 36488                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 36489                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36490 00003C2F B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 36491 00003C31 2E8B36[0647]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 36492 00003C36 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 36493 00003C38 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 36494 00003C3A 0E                              push    cs              ;
 36495 00003C3B 07                              pop     es              ;
 36496 00003C3C BE[4947]                        mov     si,szCommon
 36497 00003C3F 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 36498 00003C42 E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 36499 00003C45 7406                            je	short l2	;

 36501 00003C49 46                              inc     si              ;
 36502 00003C4A 47                              inc     di              ;
 36503 00003C4B E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 36504 00003C4D C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 36505 00003C50 07                              pop     es              ;
 36506                                  
 36507                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 36508                                  
 36509 00003C51 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36510 00003C53 2E893E[B414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36511 00003C58 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36512 00003C5A 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 36513                                  
 36514 00003C5B 51                              push    cx              ;
 36515 00003C5C F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 36516 00003C5E 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36517 00003C5F 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 36518 00003C61 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36519                                  
 36520                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 36521                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 36522                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 36523                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 36524                                  ;   is empty.
 36525                                  
 36526 00003C62 06                              push    es              ;
 36527 00003C63 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36528 00003C65 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 36529 00003C66 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	; empty the environment block
 36530 00003C6C E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36531 00003C6F 07                              pop     es
 36532                                  
 36533                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 36534                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 36535                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 36536                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 36537                                  
 36538                                  menu_done:
 36539 00003C70 803E[FB46]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 36540 00003C75 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 36541 00003C77 06                              push    es              ;
 36542 00003C78 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 36543 00003C7B 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36544 00003C7D A1[0147]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 36545 00003C80 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 36546 00003C84 A0[0047]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 36547 00003C87 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 36548 00003C8B 07                              pop     es              ;
 36549                                  menu_exit:
 36550 00003C8C 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 36551 00003C90 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 36552                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*)
 36553                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 36554                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 36555                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 36556 00003C94 C3                      	retn
 36557                                  
 36558                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 36559                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 36560                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 36561                                  
 36562                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36563                                  ;
 36564                                  ;   copy_envvar: copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36565                                  ;
 36566                                  ;   INPUT
 36567                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 36568                                  ;
 36569                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36570                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 36571                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 36572                                  ;
 36573                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36574                                  ;       None
 36575                                  ;
 36576                                  ;   NOTES
 36577                                  ;       None
 36578                                  ;
 36579                                  ;   HISTORY
 36580                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36581                                  ;
 36582                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36583                                  
 36584                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36585                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 36586                                  
 36587                                  copy_envvar:
 36588 00003C95 51                              push    cx              ;
 36589 00003C96 56                              push    si              ;
 36590 00003C97 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36591 00003C98 06                              push    es              ;
 36592 00003C99 06                              push    es              ;
 36593 00003C9A 8E06[B614]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 36594 00003C9E 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 36595                                  
 36596                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 36597                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 36598                                  ;   config.sys line)
 36599                                  ;
 36600                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 36601                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 36602                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 36603                                  
 36604 00003C9F 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 36605                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 36606 00003CA1 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 36607 00003CA2 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 36608                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36609 00003CA4 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 36610 00003CA6 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 36611                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36612 00003CA8 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 36613 00003CAA 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 36614                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36615 00003CAC 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 36616 00003CAE 41                              inc     cx              ;
 36617 00003CAF 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 36618 00003CB1 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 36619 00003CB3 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 36620 00003CB5 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 36621 00003CB7 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 36622 00003CB9 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 36623 00003CBA 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 36624                                  copy_varsrch:
 36625 00003CBC 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 36626 00003CBF 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 36627 00003CC1 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 36628 00003CC3 51                              push    cx              ;
 36629 00003CC4 56                              push    si              ;
 36630 00003CC5 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 36631 00003CC7 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36632 00003CC8 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36633 00003CC9 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 36634 00003CCB 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 36635 00003CCF 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 36636                                  
 36637                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 36638                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 36639                                  
 36640 00003CD1 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36641 00003CD4 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 36642 00003CD6 56                              push    si              ;
 36643 00003CD7 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36644 00003CD9 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 36645 00003CDB 2E8B0E[B414]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 36646 00003CE0 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 36647                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 36648                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 36649                                  
 36650 00003CE2 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 36651 00003CE3 26                      	es	; 26h
 36652 00003CE4 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 36653                                  
 36654 00003CE5 5E                      	pop     si
 36655                                  copy_envprep:
 36656 00003CE6 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 36657 00003CE9 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 36658 00003CEB 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 36659 00003CEE 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 36660                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 36661                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36662                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 36663 00003CF0 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 36664 00003CF1 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36665 00003CF3 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36666 00003CF5 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36667 00003CF7 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36668 00003CF9 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 36669 00003CFA EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36670                                  
 36671                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 36672 00003CFC 51                              push    cx              ;
 36673 00003CFD B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36674 00003D00 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 36675 00003D02 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36676 00003D03 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 36677                                  
 36678                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36679                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 36680                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 36681                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36682                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36683                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36684                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36685                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 36686                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36687                                  
 36688                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 36689 00003D05 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 36690 00003D07 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 36691                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 36692 00003D08 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 36693 00003D0B 2E893E[B414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36694                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 36695 00003D10 F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 36696                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 36697 00003D11 F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 36698 00003D12 07                              pop     es              ;
 36699 00003D13 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36700 00003D14 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36701 00003D15 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36702                                  
 36703                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36704 00003D16 C3                              retn
 36705                                  
 36706                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36707                                  ;
 36708                                  ;   copy_block: copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 36709                                  ;
 36710                                  ;   INPUT
 36711                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36712                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36713                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 36714                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 36715                                  ;
 36716                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36717                                  ;       Same as above
 36718                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 36719                                  ;
 36720                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36721                                  ;       All
 36722                                  ;
 36723                                  ;   NOTES
 36724                                  ;       None
 36725                                  ;
 36726                                  ;   HISTORY
 36727                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36728                                  ;
 36729                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36730                                  
 36731                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36732                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 36733                                  
 36734                                  copy_block:
 36735 00003D17 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 36736 00003D1A 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 36737 00003D1C 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36738 00003D1E 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 36739 00003D20 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 36740                                  
 36741 00003D22 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 36742 00003D24 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 36743 00003D26 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 36744                                  
 36745                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 36746                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 36747                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 36748                                  
 36749 00003D28 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 36750 00003D2D 57                              push    di              ;
 36751                                  
 36752 00003D2E BF[4447]                        mov     di,szMenu
 36753 00003D31 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 36754 00003D34 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36755                                  
 36756 00003D36 BF[4947]                        mov     di,szCommon
 36757 00003D39 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 36758 00003D3C 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 36759                                  
 36760 00003D3E 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 36761 00003D40 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 36762 00003D43 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 36763                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36764                                  	;pop    di              ;
 36765 00003D45 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 36766 00003D47 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 36767 00003D48 51                              push    cx              ;
 36768 00003D49 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 36769 00003D4B 56                              push    si              ;
 36770 00003D4C 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 36771 00003D4D 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 36772 00003D4F E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 36773 00003D52 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 36774 00003D55 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36775 00003D56 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36776 00003D57 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 36777 00003D59 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36778                                  
 36779                                  copy_error:
 36780                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36781 00003D5B F8                      	clc
 36782                                  copy_skip:
 36783 00003D5C 5F                              pop     di
 36784                                  ;copy_error:
 36785                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 36786                                  	;clc                    ;
 36787 00003D5D E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 36788 00003D60 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 36789                                  
 36790                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 36791                                  
 36792                                  copy_line:
 36793 00003D62 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36794 00003D64 47                              inc     di              ;
 36795 00003D65 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 36796 00003D67 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 36797 00003D69 2E803E[B914]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 36798 00003D6F 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 36799 00003D71 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 36800 00003D74 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 36801 00003D76 47                              inc     di              ;
 36802 00003D77 47                              inc     di              ;
 36803 00003D78 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 36804                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 36805 00003D7A E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 36806 00003D7D 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 36807 00003D7F 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36808 00003D81 47                              inc     di              ;
 36809                                  copy_next:
 36810 00003D82 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 36811 00003D84 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 36812                                  
 36813                                  copy_nextline:
 36814 00003D86 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36815 00003D89 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 36816                                  
 36817                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36818                                  ;copy_done:
 36819                                          ;retn
 36820                                  
 36821                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36822                                  ;
 36823                                  ;   get_linenum: return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 36824                                  ;
 36825                                  ;   INPUT
 36826                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 36827                                  ;
 36828                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36829                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 36830                                  ;
 36831                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36832                                  ;       DX
 36833                                  ;
 36834                                  ;   NOTES
 36835                                  ;       None
 36836                                  ;
 36837                                  ;   HISTORY
 36838                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36839                                  ;
 36840                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36841                                  
 36842                                  get_linenum:
 36843 00003D8B 50                              push    ax              ;
 36844 00003D8C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 36845 00003D8E 51                              push    cx              ;
 36846 00003D8F 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 36847 00003D91 56                              push    si              ;
 36848 00003D92 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36849 00003D97 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 36850                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 36851 00003D99 E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 36852 00003D9C 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 36853 00003D9E 43                              inc     bx              ;
 36854 00003D9F 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 36855 00003DA1 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 36856                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 36857 00003DA3 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36858 00003DA4 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36859 00003DA5 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36860 00003DA6 C3                              retn
 36861                                  
 36862                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36863                                  ;
 36864                                  ;   srch_block: searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 36865                                  ;
 36866                                  ;   INPUT
 36867                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 36868                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 36869                                  ;
 36870                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36871                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 36872                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 36873                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 36874                                  ;
 36875                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36876                                  ;       None
 36877                                  ;
 36878                                  ;   NOTES
 36879                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 36880                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 36881                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 36882                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 36883                                  ;
 36884                                  ;   HISTORY
 36885                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36886                                  ;
 36887                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36888                                  
 36889                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 36890 00003DA7 50                              push    ax              ;
 36891 00003DA8 51                              push    cx              ;
 36892 00003DA9 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36893 00003DAE 56                              push    si              ;
 36894 00003DAF 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36895 00003DB1 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36896 00003DB2 06                              push    es              ;
 36897 00003DB3 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36898 00003DB4 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 36899 00003DB7 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 36900 00003DB9 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 36901 00003DBB 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36902 00003DBC 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36903 00003DBD 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36904 00003DBE 58                              pop     ax              ;
 36905                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 36906 00003DBF C3                              retn			;
 36907                                  
 36908                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36909                                  ;
 36910                                  ;   find_block: searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 36911                                  ;
 36912                                  ;   INPUT
 36913                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 36914                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 36915                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 36916                                  ;
 36917                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36918                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 36919                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 36920                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36921                                  ;
 36922                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36923                                  ;       AX
 36924                                  ;
 36925                                  ;   NOTES
