 36926                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 36927                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 36928                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 36929                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 36930                                  ;
 36931                                  ;   HISTORY
 36932                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36933                                  ;
 36934                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36935                                  
 36936                                  find_block:
 36937 00003DC0 E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 36938 00003DC3 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 36939 00003DC5 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 36940 00003DC7 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 36941 00003DC9 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 36942 00003DCB 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 36943 00003DCD 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 36944 00003DCF 2E800E[B914]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 36945 00003DD5 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 36946                                  check_line:
 36947 00003DD7 2E800E[B914]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 36948 00003DDD E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 36949 00003DE0 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 36950                                  next_line:
 36951 00003DE2 E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 36952 00003DE5 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 36953                                  ;find_exit:
 36954                                  ;	retn
 36955                                  
 36956                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36957                                  ;
 36958                                  ;   comp_names: compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 36959                                  ;
 36960                                  ;   INPUT
 36961                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 36962                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36963                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36964                                  ;
 36965                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36966                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 36967                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 36968                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36969                                  ;
 36970                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36971                                  ;       AX
 36972                                  ;
 36973                                  ;   NOTES
 36974                                  ;       None
 36975                                  ;
 36976                                  ;   HISTORY
 36977                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36978                                  ;
 36979                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36980                                  
 36981                                  comp_names:
 36982 00003DE7 57                              push    di              ;
 36983                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 36984 00003DE8 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 36985 00003DEB 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 36986 00003DED E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 36987 00003DF0 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 36988 00003DF2 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 36989 00003DF4 47                              inc     di              ;
 36990 00003DF5 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 36991                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 36992 00003DF8 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 36993 00003DFA 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 36994 00003DFC F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 36995                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 36996 00003DFD 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36997 00003DFE C3                              retn			;
 36998                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 36999 00003DFF 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 37000 00003E01 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 37001 00003E04 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 37002 00003E06 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 37003                                  
 37004                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37005                                  
 37006                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37007                                  comp_names_x:
 37008                                  	;
 37009                                  comp_names_safe:
 37010 00003E08 50                              push    ax
 37011 00003E09 51                              push    cx
 37012 00003E0A 56                              push	si
 37013 00003E0B 1E                              push    ds
 37014 00003E0C 0E                              push    cs
 37015 00003E0D 1F                              pop     ds
 37016 00003E0E E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 37017 00003E11 1F                              pop     ds
 37018 00003E12 5E                      	pop	si
 37019 00003E13 59                              pop     cx
 37020 00003E14 58                              pop     ax
 37021 00003E15 C3                              retn
 37022                                  
 37023                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37024                                  ;
 37025                                  ;   print_item: display menu item #BL
 37026                                  ;
 37027                                  ;   INPUT
 37028                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 37029                                  ;
 37030                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37031                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 37032                                  ;
 37033                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37034                                  ;       None
 37035                                  ;
 37036                                  ;   NOTES
 37037                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 37038                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 37039                                  ;
 37040                                  ;   HISTORY
 37041                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37042                                  ;
 37043                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37044                                  
 37045                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37046                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 37047                                  
 37048                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 37049 00003E16 50                              push    ax              ;
 37050 00003E17 53                              push    bx              ;
 37051 00003E18 51                              push    cx              ;
 37052 00003E19 52                              push    dx              ;
 37053 00003E1A 56                              push    si              ;
 37054 00003E1B B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37055 00003E1D 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 37056 00003E21 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 37057 00003E23 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37058 00003E24 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37059 00003E26 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37060 00003E28 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 37061 00003E2B B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 37062 00003E2D CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 37063 00003E2F 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37064 00003E31 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 37065 00003E33 8A26[FA46]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 37066 00003E37 3A1E[0447]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 37067 00003E3B 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37068 00003E3D 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 37069 00003E40 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 37070 00003E42 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 37071 00003E44 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 37072 00003E46 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 37073 00003E48 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37074 00003E4A 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 37075                                  print_other:                    ;
 37076 00003E4D B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 37077 00003E4F 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37078 00003E51 8BBF[2847]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 37079 00003E55 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 37080 00003E57 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 37081 00003E5B B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 37082 00003E5D B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 37083 00003E60 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37084 00003E62 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37085 00003E64 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37086 00003E66 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37087                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 37088 00003E68 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 37089 00003E6B CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 37090 00003E6D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37091 00003E6F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37092 00003E71 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37093                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 37094 00003E73 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 37095 00003E76 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 37096 00003E78 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37097 00003E7A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37098 00003E7C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37099 00003E7E 06                              push    es              ;
 37100                                  print_loop:                     ;
 37101 00003E7F 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 37102 00003E82 47                              inc     di              ;
 37103 00003E83 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 37104 00003E85 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 37105 00003E87 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 37106                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 37107 00003E89 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 37108 00003E8B 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 37109 00003E8D 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 37110 00003E8F 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 37111 00003E91 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 37112 00003E93 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37113 00003E95 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37114 00003E97 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 37115 00003E9A 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 37116 00003E9C B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37117 00003E9E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37118 00003EA0 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 37119                                  print_done:                     ;
 37120 00003EA2 07                              pop     es              ;
 37121 00003EA3 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37122 00003EA4 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37123 00003EA6 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 37124 00003EA8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37125 00003EA9 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37126 00003EAA 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37127 00003EAB 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37128 00003EAC 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37129 00003EAD C3                              retn			;
 37130                                  
 37131                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37132                                  ;
 37133                                  ;   select_item: wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 37134                                  ;
 37135                                  ;   INPUT
 37136                                  ;       None
 37137                                  ;
 37138                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37139                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 37140                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 37141                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 37142                                  ;
 37143                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37144                                  ;       None
 37145                                  ;
 37146                                  ;   NOTES
 37147                                  ;       None
 37148                                  ;
 37149                                  ;   HISTORY
 37150                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37151                                  ;
 37152                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37153                                  
 37154                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 37155 00003EAE 8A1E[0447]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 37156 00003EB2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37157 00003EB4 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 37158 00003EB7 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 37159 00003EBA 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 37160 00003EBF 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 37161 00003EC1 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 37162 00003EC3 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37163 00003EC5 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 37164                                  check_time:
 37165 00003EC7 A0[0847]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 37166 00003ECA 2A06[0947]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 37167 00003ECE 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 37168 00003ED0 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; disable all further prompting
 37169 00003ED5 C606[0947]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 37170 00003EDA E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 37171                                  show_time:
 37172 00003EDD 53                              push    bx              ;
 37173 00003EDE 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 37174 00003EE0 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37175 00003EE4 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37176 00003EE6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37177 00003EE8 52                              push    dx              ;
 37178 00003EE9 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 37179 00003EEC B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37180 00003EEE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37181 00003EF0 BA[C04C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 37182 00003EF3 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 37183 00003EF6 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 37184 00003EF8 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 37185 00003EF9 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 37186 00003EFB F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 37187 00003EFD 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 37188 00003EFF 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37189 00003F01 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37190 00003F03 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 37191 00003F05 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 37192 00003F07 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37193 00003F09 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37194 00003F0B CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 37195 00003F0D 5A                              pop     dx
 37196 00003F0E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 37197 00003F10 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37198 00003F12 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37199                                  input_key:
 37200 00003F13 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 37201 00003F15 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 37202 00003F17 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37203 00003F19 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 37204 00003F1B 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 37205 00003F20 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 37206 00003F22 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 37207 00003F24 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 37208 00003F26 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 37209 00003F28 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 37210 00003F2A 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 37211 00003F2C 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 37212 00003F2E B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 37213                                  got_time:
 37214 00003F30 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 37215 00003F32 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 37216 00003F34 0036[0947]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 37217 00003F38 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 37218                                  got_key:
 37219 00003F3A 50                              push    ax              ;
 37220 00003F3B B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 37221 00003F3E 8706[0847]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 37222 00003F42 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 37223 00003F44 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 37224 00003F46 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 37225 00003F47 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37226 00003F4A 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37227 00003F4E B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 37228 00003F51 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 37229 00003F53 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 37230                                  
 37231                                  timeout_disabled:
 37232 00003F54 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37233 00003F55 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 37234 00003F57 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 37235 00003F59 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 37236 00003F5B 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 37237                                  
 37238 00003F5D 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 37239 00003F5F 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 37240 00003F61 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 37241 00003F64 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 37242 00003F66 FE0E[0447]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37243 00003F6A E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37244 00003F6D FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 37245 00003F6F EB12                            jmp     short print1
 37246                                  not_up:
 37247 00003F71 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 37248 00003F73 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 37249 00003F75 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 37250 00003F79 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 37251 00003F7B FE06[0447]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37252 00003F7F E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37253 00003F82 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 37254                                  print1: 
 37255 00003F83 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 37256                                  print2: 
 37257 00003F85 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 37258 00003F88 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 37259                                  to_input_key:
 37260 00003F8B EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 37261                                  not_down:
 37262 00003F8D F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37263 00003F92 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 37264 00003F94 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 37265 00003F96 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 37266 00003F98 8036[0347]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 37267 00003F9D E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 37268 00003FA0 E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 37269                                  not_f8:
 37270 00003FA3 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 37271 00003FA5 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 37272                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37273                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 37274                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 37275 00003FA7 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 37276 00003FAC BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 37277 00003FAF B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 37278 00003FB1 EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 37279                                  
 37280                                  normal_key:
 37281 00003FB3 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 37282 00003FB5 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 37283 00003FB7 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 37284 00003FB9 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 37285 00003FBB BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 37286 00003FBE C3                              retn			;
 37287                                  not_backspace:
 37288 00003FBF 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 37289 00003FC1 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 37290 00003FC3 3A06[0547]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 37291 00003FC7 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 37292 00003FC9 A2[0447]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 37293 00003FCC E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 37294 00003FCF 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 37295 00003FD1 EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 37296                                  
 37297                                  select_done:
 37298 00003FD3 B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 37299 00003FD5 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37300 00003FD7 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 37301                                  
 37302                                  	; fall into disp_input
 37303                                  
 37304                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37305                                  
 37306                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37307                                  ;
 37308                                  ;   disp_input: display a single character + cr/lf
 37309                                  ;
 37310                                  ;   INPUT
 37311                                  ;       AL == character to display
 37312                                  ;
 37313                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37314                                  ;       None
 37315                                  ;
 37316                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37317                                  ;       None
 37318                                  ;
 37319                                  ;   NOTES
 37320                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 37321                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 37322                                  ;
 37323                                  ;   HISTORY
 37324                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37325                                  ;
 37326                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37327                                  
 37328                                  disp_input:
 37329 00003FD9 50                      	push	ax
 37330                                  	;cmp	al,' '
 37331                                  	;jae	short disp_ok
 37332                                  	;mov	al,' '
 37333                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO:SYS (Optimization)
 37334 00003FDA B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 37335 00003FDC 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 37336 00003FDE 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 37337                                  disp_ok:
 37338 00003FE0 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 37339                                  disp_input_ok:
 37340 00003FE2 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37341 00003FE4 CD21                    	int	21h
 37342 00003FE6 BA[1E4A]                	mov	dx,crlfm
 37343 00003FE9 E8E504                  	call	print
 37344 00003FEC 58                      	pop	ax
 37345 00003FED C3                      	retn
 37346                                  
 37347                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37348                                  
 37349                                  disp_num:
 37350 00003FEE 53                              push    bx
 37351 00003FEF 0430                            add     al,'0'
 37352 00003FF1 B40A                            mov     ah,0Ah
 37353 00003FF3 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37354 00003FF7 B90100                          mov     cx,1
 37355 00003FFA CD10                            int     10h
 37356 00003FFC 5B                              pop     bx
 37357 00003FFD C3                              retn
 37358                                  
 37359                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37360                                  ;
 37361                                  ;   show_status: display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 37362                                  ;
 37363                                  ;   INPUT
 37364                                  ;       None
 37365                                  ;
 37366                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37367                                  ;       None
 37368                                  ;
 37369                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37370                                  ;       None
 37371                                  ;
 37372                                  ;   NOTES
 37373                                  ;       None
 37374                                  ;
 37375                                  ;   HISTORY
 37376                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37377                                  ;
 37378                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37379                                  
 37380                                  show_status:
 37381 00003FFE 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 37382 00003FFF 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37383 00004003 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37384 00004005 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37385 00004007 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37386 00004008 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37387 0000400A 8B16[FD46]                      mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 37388 0000400E F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37389 00004013 740C                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 37390 00004015 B200                            mov     dl,0            ;
 37391 00004017 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37392 00004019 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37393 0000401C B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 37394                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37395                                  	;int	10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 37396 0000401F EB11                            jmp     short show_done ;
 37397                                  show_onoff: 
 37398 00004021 CD10                            int     10h
 37399                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 37400                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 37401                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 37402                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 37403                                  
 37404 00004023 A0[BC4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 37405 00004026 803E[0347]01                    cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 37406 0000402B 7503                            jne	short show_noton ; no
 37407 0000402D A0[B84C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 37408                                  show_noton:                     ;
 37409 00004030 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 37410                                  show_done:	; 10/09/2023
 37411 00004032 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37412                                  ;show_done:                     ;
 37413 00004034 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37414 00004035 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37415 00004037 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 37416 00004039 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37417 0000403A C3                              retn			;
 37418                                  
 37419                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37420                                  
 37421                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37422                                  ;
 37423                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 37424                                  ;
 37425                                  ;   INPUT
 37426                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37427                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37428                                  ;
 37429                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37430                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 37431                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 37432                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 37433                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37434                                  ;
 37435                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37436                                  ;       AX
 37437                                  ;
 37438                                  ;   NOTES
 37439                                  ;       None
 37440                                  ;
 37441                                  ;   HISTORY
 37442                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37443                                  ;
 37444                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37445                                  
 37446                                  skip_token:
 37447 0000403B E84D00                          call    get_char
 37448 0000403E 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 37449 00004040 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 37450 00004043 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 37451                                  skip_check_eol:
 37452 00004045 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 37453 00004047 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37454 00004049 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37455 0000404B 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37456 0000404D F8                              clc
 37457                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 37458 0000404E C3                      	retn
 37459                                  skip_token_eol:
 37460 0000404F F9                              stc
 37461                                  skip_token_done:
 37462 00004050 C3                              retn
 37463                                  
 37464                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37465                                  ;
 37466                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37467                                  ;
 37468                                  ;   INPUT
 37469                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37470                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37471                                  ;
 37472                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37473                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37474                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37475                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37476                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37477                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37478                                  ;
 37479                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37480                                  ;       AX
 37481                                  ;
 37482                                  ;   NOTES
 37483                                  ;       None
 37484                                  ;
 37485                                  ;   HISTORY
 37486                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37487                                  ;
 37488                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37489                                  
 37490                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37491 00004051 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37492 00004054 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37493 00004057 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37494 00004059 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 37495 0000405C 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37496 0000405E EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37497                                  
 37498                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37499                                  ;
 37500                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37501                                  ;
 37502                                  ;   INPUT
 37503                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37504                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37505                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37506                                  ;
 37507                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37508                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37509                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37510                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37511                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37512                                  ;
 37513                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37514                                  ;       AX
 37515                                  ;
 37516                                  ;   NOTES
 37517                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37518                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37519                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37520                                  ;
 37521                                  ;   HISTORY
 37522                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37523                                  ;
 37524                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37525                                  
 37526                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37527                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37528                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37529                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37530                                       
 37531                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37532                                  
 37533                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37534                                  ;
 37535                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37536                                  ;
 37537                                  ;   INPUT
 37538                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37539                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37540                                  ;
 37541                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37542                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37543                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37544                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37545                                  ;
 37546                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37547                                  ;       AX
 37548                                  ;
 37549                                  ;   NOTES
 37550                                  ;       None
 37551                                  ;
 37552                                  ;   HISTORY
 37553                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37554                                  ;
 37555                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37556                                  
 37557                                  skip_line:
 37558 00004060 E82800                          call    get_char
 37559 00004063 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 37560                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37561 00004065 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37562 00004067 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 37563                                  skip_line_done:
 37564                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37565 00004069 C3                              retn
 37566                                  
 37567                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37568                                  ;
 37569                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 37570                                  ;
 37571                                  ;   INPUT
 37572                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37573                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37574                                  ;
 37575                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37576                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 37577                                  ;       BX == binary #
 37578                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 37579                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37580                                  ;
 37581                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37582                                  ;       AX
 37583                                  ;
 37584                                  ;   NOTES
 37585                                  ;       None
 37586                                  ;
 37587                                  ;   HISTORY
 37588                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37589                                  ;
 37590                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37591                                  
 37592                                  ; 13/05/2019
 37593                                  
 37594                                  get_number:
 37595 0000406A 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 37596                                  num_loop:
 37597 0000406C E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 37598 0000406F 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 37599 00004071 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 37600 00004073 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 37601 00004075 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 37602 00004077 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 37603 00004079 50                              push    ax              ;
 37604 0000407A B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 37605 0000407D 52                              push    dx              ;
 37606 0000407E F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 37607 00004080 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37608 00004081 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 37609 00004083 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37610 00004084 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 37611 00004086 98                              cbw                     ;
 37612 00004087 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 37613 00004089 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 37614                                  
 37615                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37616                                  ;num_done:
 37617                                          ;retn
 37618                                  
 37619                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37620                                  ;
 37621                                  ;   get_char: return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 37622                                  ;
 37623                                  ;   INPUT
 37624                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37625                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37626                                  ;
 37627                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37628                                  ;       AL == next character
 37629                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 37630                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37631                                  ;
 37632                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37633                                  ;       AX
 37634                                  ;
 37635                                  ;   NOTES
 37636                                  ;       None
 37637                                  ;
 37638                                  ;   HISTORY
 37639                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37640                                  ;
 37641                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37642                                  
 37643                                  get_char:
 37644 0000408B 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 37645 0000408E 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 37646                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 37647 00004090 26                      	es	
 37648 00004091 AC                      	lodsb
 37649 00004092 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 37650 00004094 C3                              retn			;
 37651                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 37652 00004095 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 37653                                  nearby_ret:
 37654 00004098 C3                              retn
 37655                                  
 37656                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37657                                  ;
 37658                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 37659                                  ;
 37660                                  ;   INPUT
 37661                                  ;       AL == current command code
 37662                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37663                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 37664                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 37665                                  ;
 37666                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37667                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 37668                                  ;
 37669                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37670                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 37671                                  ;
 37672                                  ;   NOTES
 37673                                  ;       None
 37674                                  ;
 37675                                  ;   HISTORY
 37676                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37677                                  ;
 37678                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37679                                  
 37680                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37681                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 37682                                  
 37683                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37684                                  query_user:
 37685 00004099 F606[0347]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 37686                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37687 0000409E 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 37688 000040A0 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 37689                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37690                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 37691                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 37692                                  qu_1:
 37693 000040A3 F606[0347]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 37694 000040A8 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 37695 000040AA 50                              push    ax                      ;
 37696 000040AB A0[B814]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 37697 000040AE F606[0347]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 37698 000040B3 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 37699 000040B5 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 37700                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37701 000040B7 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 37702                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37703                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 37704                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 37705                                  
 37706                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37707 000040B9 58                      	pop	ax
 37708 000040BA C3                      	retn

 37710                                  query_all:
 37711                                  
 37712                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 37713                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 37714                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 37715                                  
 37716 000040BB 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37717 000040BC BA[124D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 37718 000040BF 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37719 000040C1 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 37720                                  
 37721 000040C3 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 37722 000040C5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 37723 000040C7 BF[5047]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 37724                                  find_match:                             ;
 37725 000040CA 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 37726 000040CC 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 37727 000040CE 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 37728 000040D0 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37729 000040D1 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 37730 000040D3 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 37731 000040D5 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 37732                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 37733 000040D8 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 37734                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 37735 000040DA 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 37736 000040DD B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 37737 000040DF B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37738                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 37739 000040E1 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 37740 000040E3 47                              inc     di                      ;
 37741 000040E4 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37742 000040E6 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37743 000040E8 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 37744 000040EA B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 37745 000040EC 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 37746 000040EF 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 37747 000040F1 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 37748                                  cmd_notset:
 37749 000040F3 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 37750                                  line_print:                             ;
 37751                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 37752 000040F5 26                              es
 37753 000040F6 AC                      	lodsb
 37754 000040F7 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 37755 000040F9 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 37756 000040FB B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 37757                                  non_null:                               ;
 37758 000040FD 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 37759 000040FF 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 37760 00004101 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 37761                                          ; 10/09/2023
 37762 00004103 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 37763                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 37764 00004106 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 37765                                  non_space:                              ;
 37766 00004108 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 37767 0000410A B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 37768 0000410C CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 37769 0000410E EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 37770                                  
 37771                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 37772 00004110 BA[B04C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 37773                                  
 37774                                  generic_prompt:
 37775 00004113 E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 37776                                  input_loop:                             ;
 37777 00004116 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 37778 00004118 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 37779 0000411A 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 37780 0000411C 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 37781 0000411E 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 37782 00004121 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 37783 00004123 A0[BC4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO] 		;
 37784 00004126 800E[0347]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 37785 0000412B EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 37786                                  not_func:
 37787 0000412D 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 37788 0000412F 3A06[BC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 37789 00004133 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 37790 00004135 3A06[B84C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 37791 00004139 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 37792 0000413B 803E[B814]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 37793 00004140 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 37794 00004142 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 37795 00004144 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 37796 00004146 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 37797 0000414B A0[B84C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 37798                                  legal_char:                             ;
 37799 0000414E E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 37800 00004151 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37801                                  
 37802 00004152 3A06[BC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 37803 00004156 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 37804                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37805 00004158 F8                      	clc
 37806                                  do_cmd:
 37807 00004159 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37808                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37809                                  	; cf=0
 37810                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 37811 0000415A C3                      	retn
 37812                                  
 37813                                  skip_cmd:
 37814 0000415B 58                      	pop     ax			;
 37815                                  skip_all:
 37816 0000415C B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 37817 0000415E F9                      	stc
 37818 0000415F C3                      	retn

 37875                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37876                                  
 37877                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 37878                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 37879                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 37880                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 37881                                  
 37882                                  disable_autoexec:
 37883                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 37884                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37885                                  
 37886 00004194 F606[0347]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 37887 00004199 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 37888 0000419B F606[F946]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 37889 000041A0 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 37890 000041A2 800E[F946]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 37891                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 37892 000041A7 810E[0347]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 37893 000041AD BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 37894                                  dae_1:
 37895                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37896 000041B0 A0[3846]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 37897                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 37898 000041B3 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 37899 000041B5 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 37900 000041B7 8A1E[3946]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 37901 000041BB B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 37902 000041BD 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 37903 000041BF 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 37904 000041C2 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 37905 000041C5 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 37906 000041C7 881E[3946]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 37907 000041CB 81C3[3A46]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 37908 000041CF 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 37909                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 37910 000041D0 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 37911 000041D3 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 37912 000041D5 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 37913 000041D6 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 37914 000041D8 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 37915                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 37916 000041DB 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 37917                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 37918                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 37919 000041DE C3                              retn
 37920

 37944

 37949                                  ;%if 0
 37950                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37951                                  ;
 37952                                  any_delim:
 37953 000041F7 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 37954 000041F9 7427                    	je	short delim_ret
 37955 000041FB 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf

 37959 00004203 3C5D                    	cmp	al,']'
 37960 00004205 741B                    	je	short delim_ret
 37961                                  ;

 37965                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 37966                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 37967                                  delim:
 37968 00004207 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 37969 00004209 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 37970                                  
 37971 0000420B 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 37972 0000420D 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 37973                                  
 37974                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 37975 0000420F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 37976 00004211 740F                    	je	short delim_ret

 38059                                  ; 
 38060                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 38061                                  ;
 38062                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38063                                  
 38064                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38065                                  
 38066                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38067                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 38068                                  mapcase:
 38069 00004243 51                      	push	cx

 38071 00004245 1E                      	push	ds
 38072                                  
 38073 00004246 06                      	push	es
 38074 00004247 1F                      	pop	ds
 38075                                  
 38076                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38077                                  
 38078                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38079                                  
 38080                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38081 00004248 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 38082                                  ;else
 38083                                  ;	xor	si,si
 38084                                  ;endif
 38085                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38086                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38087                                  	;xor	si, si
 38088                                  
 38089                                  convloop:
 38090 0000424A AC                      	lodsb
 38091 0000424B 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 38092 0000424D 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 38093 0000424F 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 38094 00004251 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 38095 00004253 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 38096 00004255 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 38097                                  noconv:
 38098                                  
 38099                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38100                                  
 38101                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38102                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38103                                  
 38104                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 38105                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 38106                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 38107                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 38108                                  ;
 38109 00004258 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 38110 0000425B 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 38111 0000425D 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 38112 0000425F 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 38113                                  check_eol:
 38114 00004261 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 38115 00004263 7406                    	je	short convdone
 38116 00004265 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 38117 00004267 7402                    	je	short convdone
 38118                                  ;endif
 38119                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38120 00004269 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 38121                                  convdone:
 38122 0000426B 1F                      	pop	ds
 38123 0000426C 5E                      	pop	si
 38124 0000426D 59                      	pop	cx
 38125 0000426E C3                      	retn

 38147

 38243                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38244                                  ;
 38245                                  ; procedure : getnum
 38246                                  ;
 38247                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 38248                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 38249                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 38250                                  ;
 38251                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38252                                  
 38253                                  getnum:
 38254 000042E2 53                      	push	bx
 38255 000042E3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 38256                                  b2:
 38257 000042E5 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 38258 000042E8 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 38259                                  
 38260 000042EA 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 38261 000042EB 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 38262                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 38263                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38264 000042EC B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 38265 000042EE F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 38266 000042F0 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 38267 000042F1 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 38268 000042F3 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 38269 000042F6 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 38270                                  
 38271 000042F8 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 38272                                  
 38273 000042F9 E830FF                  	call	getchr			; get next digit
 38274 000042FC 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 38275 000042FE 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 38276 00004300 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 38277 00004302 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 38278 00004304 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 38279 00004306 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 38280 00004308 7417                    	je	short b15
 38281 0000430A 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 38282 0000430F 7410                    	je	short b15
 38283 00004311 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 38284                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38285                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38286                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 38287                                  	;nop
 38288 00004313 740C                    	je	short b15
 38289 00004315 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 38290 00004317 7408                    	je	short b15
 38291 00004319 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 38292 0000431B 7404                    	je	short b15
 38293 0000431D 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 38294 0000431F 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 38295                                  b15:
 38296 00004321 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 38297 00004326 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 38298                                  b1:
 38299 0000432B 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 38300 0000432D 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 38301 0000432F 5B                      	pop	bx
 38302 00004330 C3                      	retn
 38303                                  badnum:
 38304                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38305                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 38306 00004331 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 38307                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 38308 00004333 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 38309 00004337 5B                      	pop	bx
 38310 00004338 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 38311 00004339 C3                      	retn
