 38314                                  
 38315                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 38316                                  
 38317                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38318                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 38319                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 38320                                  ;	si = 0
 38321                                  ;	ax = country id
 38322                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 38323                                  ;	bx = file handle
 38324                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 38325                                  ;
 38326                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 38327                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 38328                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 38329                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 38330                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38331                                  
 38332                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38333                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 38334                                  
 38335                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38336                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)
 38337                                  
 38338 0000433A 57                      	push	di
 38339 0000433B 50                      	push	ax
 38340 0000433C 52                      	push	dx
 38341                                  
 38342 0000433D 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 38343 0000433F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 38344 00004341 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 38345 00004344 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 38346 00004347 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38347                                  
 38348 00004349 06                      	push	es
 38349 0000434A 56                      	push	si
 38350                                  
 38351 0000434B 0E                      	push	cs
 38352 0000434C 07                      	pop	es
 38353                                  
 38354 0000434D BF[9E45]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 38355 00004350 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 38356 00004353 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 38357                                  
 38358 00004355 5E                      	pop	si
 38359 00004356 07                      	pop	es
 38360 00004357 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 38361                                  
 38362 00004359 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 38363 0000435C 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 38364 0000435F 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 38365                                  
 38366 00004361 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 38367 00004362 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 38368 00004364 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 38369 00004367 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 38370 0000436A E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 38371 0000436D 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38372                                  
 38373 0000436F 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 38374 00004371 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 38375 00004375 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 38376                                  
 38377 00004377 46                      	inc	si
 38378 00004378 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 38379 00004379 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 38380 0000437A 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 38381 0000437B 5F                      	pop	di
 38382                                  
 38383                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 38384 0000437C 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 38385 0000437F 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 38386                                  
 38387                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 38388                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 38389                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38390 00004381 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 38391 00004383 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 38392 00004385 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 38393 00004388 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 38394                                  
 38395                                  setdoscntry_next:
 38396 0000438A 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 38397 0000438C 46                      	inc	si
 38398 0000438D 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 38399 0000438E E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 38400                                  
 38401                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 38402                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38403 00004390 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 38404                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 38405 00004391 F9                      	stc
 38406 00004392 C3                      	retn
 38407                                  
 38408                                  setdosdata_fail:
 38409 00004393 5E                      	pop	si
 38410 00004394 59                      	pop	cx
 38411 00004395 5F                      	pop	di
 38412 00004396 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 38413                                  
 38414                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 38415 00004398 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 38416                                  
 38417                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 38418 0000439B 2E8916[A645]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 38419 000043A0 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 38420 000043A3 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 38421 000043A6 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 38422 000043A9 E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 38423 000043AC 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 38424                                  
 38425 000043AE 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 38426 000043B0 46                      	inc	si
 38427 000043B1 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 38428                                  
 38429                                  setdoscntry_data:
 38430 000043B2 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 38431 000043B3 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 38432 000043B4 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 38433                                  
 38434 000043B5 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 38435 000043B8 E8A400                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 38436 000043BB 727C                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 38437                                  
 38438 000043BD 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 38439 000043C0 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 38440 000043C3 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38441 000043C6 F9                      	stc
 38442 000043C7 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38443 000043C9 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38444                                  
 38445 000043CB BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 38446 000043CE B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 38447 000043D1 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 38448 000043D3 F9                      	stc
 38449 000043D4 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 38450 000043D6 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 38451                                  
 38452 000043D8 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38453 000043DA 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 38454                                  
 38455 000043DC 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 38456 000043DF 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 38457 000043E2 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38458 000043E5 F9                      	stc
 38459 000043E6 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 38460 000043E8 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38461                                  
 38462 000043EA 56                      	push	si
 38463 000043EB BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 38464 000043EE 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 38465 000043F0 5E                      	pop	si
 38466 000043F1 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 38467 000043F4 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 38468 000043F7 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 38469 000043F9 F9                      	stc
 38470 000043FA CD21                    	int	21h
 38471 000043FC 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38472                                  
 38473 000043FE 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38474 00004400 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 38475

 38578                                  getcountrydestination:
 38579                                  
 38580                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38581                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 38582                                  ;
 38583                                  ;input: al - data id
 38584                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 38585                                  ;on return:
 38586                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 38587                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 38588                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38589                                  
 38590                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38591                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 38592                                  
 38593                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38594                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 38595                                  
 38596 0000445F 51                      	push	cx
 38597                                  	;add	di,74
 38598 00004460 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 38599                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 38600 00004463 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 38601 00004466 47                      	inc	di
 38602 00004467 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 38603                                  
 38604                                  getcntrydest:

 38606 0000446B 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 38607                                  
 38608 0000446D 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 38609 00004471 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 38610                                  
 38611 00004473 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 38612 00004476 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 38613                                  
 38614                                  getcntrydest_1:
 38615                                  	;add	di,41
 38616 00004478 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 38617                                  getcntrydest_loop:

 38620                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 38621                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 38622                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38623 0000447E 59                      	pop	cx
 38624 0000447F C3                      	retn
 38625

 38649                                  
 38650                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 38651                                  
 38652                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38653                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 38654                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 38655                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 38656                                  ;
 38657                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 38658                                  ;	 be moved.
 38659                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 38660                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 38661                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 38662                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 38663                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 38664                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 38665                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38666                                  
 38667 0000448A 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 38668 0000448B B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38669 0000448E F9                      	stc
 38670 0000448F CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38671 00004491 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 38672 00004492 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 38673                                  
 38674 00004494 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 38675 00004496 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 38676 00004498 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 38677 0000449A F9                      	stc
 38678 0000449B CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 38679                                  ricb_exit:
 38680 0000449D C3                      	retn

 38684                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 38685                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 38686                                  %if 0
 38687                                  
 38688                                  set_country_path:
 38689                                  
 38690                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38691                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 38692                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 38693                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 38694                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 38695                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 38696                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 38697                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38698                                  
 38699                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38700                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 38701                                  
 38702                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38703                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 38704                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 38705                                  
 38706                                  	push	si
 38707                                  
 38708                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38709                                  	push	es
 38710                                  	pop	ds
 38711                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 38712                                  
 38713                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 38714                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 38715                                  
 38716                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38717                                  	inc	si
 38718                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 38719                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 38720                                  
 38721                                  scp_default_drv:
 38722                                  	mov	ah,19h
 38723                                  	int	21h
 38724                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 38725                                  
 38726                                  scp_setdrv:
 38727                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 38728                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 38729                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38730                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 38731                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 38732                                  
 38733                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 38734                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 38735                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 38736                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38737                                  	jne	short scp_path
 38738                                  
 38739                                  scp_root_dir:
 38740                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 38741                                  scp_path:
 38742                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 38743                                  
 38744                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 38745                                  scpath_exit:
 38746                                  
 38747                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38748                                  	push	es
 38749                                  	pop	ds
 38750                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 38751                                  
 38752                                  	pop	si
 38753                                  	retn
 38754                                  
 38755                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38756                                  
 38757                                  chk_drive_letter:
 38758                                  
 38759                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 38760                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 38761                                  ;carry set if not.
 38762                                  
 38763                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 38764                                  
 38765                                  	push	ax
 38766                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 38767                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 38768                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 38769                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 38770                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 38771                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 38772                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 38773                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 38774                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38775                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 38776                                  
 38777                                  cdletter_no:
 38778                                  	stc
 38779                                  cdletter_exit:
 38780                                  	pop	ax
 38781                                  	retn
 38782                                  
 38783                                  %endif

 38793                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
